column2: Skill required:Digital Marketing - Hyper Text Markup Language (HTML)  Designation:Management Level - Analyst  Job Location:Gurugram  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:3 to 5 years  What would you do? Be a part of the Marketing Operations team that is leading the managed services arm of Accenture. We power our client's business through the integration of insights, data, and technology. We are focused on activating and scaling the best brand experiences, to deliver breakthrough marketing-led growth, cost-effectively, across all digital consumer touchpoints and channels. The value we bring to clients boosts their marketing efficiency and effectiveness that powers their growth. We're looking to hire passionate and innovative leaders in Marketing Operations with deep domain expertise in digital marketing and delivering cutting edge marketing services across a range of clients and industries, bringing with them strong operations acumen and transformative leadership. You will be working as a part of the Digital Marketing team to understand and help clients market their products or services using digital technologies, mainly on the internet, but also including mobile phone apps, display advertising, e-commerce/online shopping website, and any other digital medium. The team also leverages popular tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Workfront Work Management Software, HTML, Javascript, Atlassian Jira, etc. The Program and Project Management team is highly focused on delivering successful projects to clients on time while ensuring that they are well within the scope and the budget. The team is responsible for initiating, planning, and executing projects while also tracking, managing dependencies, predicting, and mitigating risks. This team is also responsible for establishing and maintaining relationships with key stakeholders and third-party vendors.  What are we looking for? Ability to establish strong client relationship  Ability to handle disputes  Ability to manage multiple stakeholders  Ability to meet deadlines  Ability to perform under pressure Roles and Responsibilities  In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of lower-complexity problems  Your day to day interaction is with peers within Accenture before updating supervisors  In this role you may have limited exposure with clients and/or Accenture management  You will be given moderate level instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instructions on new assignments  The decisions you make impact your own work and may impact the work of others  You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a focused scope of work  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts
column11: digital marketing, adobe creative suite, javascript, html, atlassian jira, email marketing, wordpress, adobe, advertising, campaign management, marketing, display advertising, google analytics, work management, marketing operations, seo, internet

column2: # Job Description: Digital Marketing Manager (eCommerce) ## Overview We are looking for a highly driven Digital Marketing Manager with robust experience in eCommerce and international projects to head our team. The successful candidate will possess superb knowledge of SEO, Social Media, Email Marketing, and the design and development process. This role requires strong leadership skills, with a proven record of managing teams and leading innovative marketing strategies that boost our brand and products internationally. ## Responsibilities *   Leverage knowledge of eCommerce and international markets to plan, develop, and implement strategic digital marketing campaigns that increase brand visibility, customer engagement, and conversion rates. *   Lead and manage the marketing team, fostering a culture of collaboration and innovation, liaising between various departments to ensure strategic alignment. *   Oversee the company's Search Engine Optimization (SEO) efforts, implementing strategies that enhance organic search rankings and overall site visibility. *   Utilize various social media platforms to devise, implement, and manage campaigns that effectively promote our products and brand. *   Develop and monitor impactful email marketing campaigns to engage with customers and drive conversions. *   Collaborate closely with design and development teams to ensure marketing strategies are effectively integrated into website designs and developments. *   Conduct digital audits and perform data analysis to assess campaign effectiveness, making data-driven decisions to optimize marketing efforts. *   Stay abreast of shifts in market trends and competition, adjusting strategies as needed to ensure maximum effectiveness. *   Promote team development and performance by providing clear instructions, feedback, and motivation. *   Coordinate with team members and stakeholders to ensure consistency, successful execution, and coordination of marketing efforts. ## Qualifications *   Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field. *   Minimum of 5 years experience in a Digital Marketing managerial role, with a focus on eCommerce and international projects. *   Proven expertise in SEO, Social Media Marketing, and Email Marketing. *   Familiarity with design and development processes for digital marketing assets. *   Profound understanding of digital marketing tools, technologies, and best practices. *   Proven leadership experience, with the ability to inspire, motivate, and manage a team. *   Exceptional communication skills, both verbal and written, with the capacity to present strategies and performance reports to stakeholders. *   Strong organizational and project management abilities, capable of effectively handling multiple projects simultaneously and meeting deadlines. *   Strong analytical ability, coupled with a data-driven mind-set. Interested candidates should provide a portfolio or examples of their previous work, with a specific focus on eCommerce and international projects.
column11: Digital Marketing, Affiliate Marketing, Online Marketing, Email Marketing, Online Lead Generation, Pay Per Click, Social Media Optimization, Search Engine Optimization

column2: We are seeking an experienced Digital Marketing Specialist to join our dynamic team      As a Digital Marketing Specialist, you will be responsible for developing and implementing digital marketing strategies to drive online visibility, brand awareness, and customer engagement      This is a key role that requires a deep understanding of various digital marketing channels, analytics, and industry trends          Required Qualifications :      UG: Any Graduate          PG: Any Postgraduate      Responsibilities :      Develop and execute innovative digital marketing strategies to enhance brand presence and achieve business objectives.          Plan, implement, and optimize digital advertising campaigns across multiple platforms such as Google Ads, social media channels, and display networks.          Conduct thorough market research to identify target audiences, consumer behavior, and industry trends to refine marketing strategies.          Manage and optimize company website, ensuring it is user-friendly, optimized for search engines, and consistently updated with relevant content.          Monitor and analyze website traffic and user engagement using web analytics tools, and provide actionable insights to improve performance.          Create and manage engaging social media campaigns to increase brand awareness, followers, and customer engagement.          Collaborate with the content team to develop compelling and SEO-friendly content for various digital platforms.          Stay up-to-date with emerging digital marketing trends, tools, and best practices, and implement innovative strategies to maintain a competitive edge.          Monitor and report on key performance metrics, providing regular progress reports to stakeholders.          Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including design, sales, and product and with client as well, to align digital marketing strategies with overall business goals.      Requirements :      Proven work experience as a Digital Marketing Expert, with a successful track record of implementing and managing digital marketing campaigns.          In-depth knowledge of various digital marketing channels, including SEO, SEM, social media marketing, email marketing, and display advertising.          Proficient in using digital marketing tools and platforms such as Google Analytics, Google Ads, social media management tools, and email marketing software.          Strong analytical skills, with the ability to collect, analyze, and interpret data to make informed decisions and drive optimization.          Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to create compelling content and effectively convey marketing messages.          Creative and strategic thinking, with the ability to develop innovative solutions and adapt to changing market trends.          Strong project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks, meet deadlines, and manage multiple projects simultaneously.          Proactive and self-motivated, with a strong attention to detail and a passion for staying ahead of industry developments.

column2: About the opportunity: As the Storefronts & eCommerce Manager (Adobe Experience Manager) for our brands in the ANZ/SG region, you will be the center of expertise for all things Storefronts. The AEM Storefronts Manager role is flexi-remote providing the freedom for the candidate to be based in Australia, Singapore, the Philippines, or India. You will be accountable for managing and driving many aspects of our online stores including content management, campaign release controls, A/B testing, UX tests, onsite development oversight, project management. Plus meeting the performance objectives with a focus on customer experience, sales and conversion rate. In this role you will collaborate various X-functional stakeholders, including brand managers, development managers and marketing and product teams to ensure all communication and creative aligns with the brand and business goals and is consistent with our wider ecommerce and marketing initiatives. This role offers a largely remote working experience with flexible working hours and an opportunity to engage with teams across the APAC region! What youll do & how youll make your mark. Core Deliverables Build, maintain and track the platform roadmap and make sure it continuously aligns with the business strategy, including impacts to customer and key eCommerce drivers. Operate as an execution-leader and guide the brand squads with the content management of AEM and non-AEM storefronts Operate as an execution-leader and guide the brand squads with customer panel driven content changes, campaign changes, UX & product initiatives Oversee multi-brand instance of AEM, managing roadmaps and release cycles and collaborating with respective brand managers on deliverables Continuously measure and report key storefront performance metrics like CVR / Click & Engagement Metrics / Load Time Ensure user management and controls are governed by policies and procedures Drive continuous improvement through frequent deployments of onsite tests, while tracking & measuring performance through tools like Google Analytics, Hotjar, Optimizely and other forms of customer insight Work with UX designers to create PRDs & high-level mockups/wireframes along with our Design team to define desired outcomes Stakeholder Management Proactively manage all relevant stakeholders including senior management, building consensus and commitment to project outcomes Work collaboratively with cross functional stakeholders and in close conjunction with the design and engineering teams to align on roadmaps and deliverables Engage & cultivate relationships with partners across the business, gain insight and adopt best practices Partner closely with Analytics teams to evolve our understanding of performance across eCommerce. Collaborate with marketing, sales & support teams on the go-to-market planning for products Work across various APAC time zones (Australia, Philippines, Singapore & India) being available to the various team members and meeting schedules. Data & Analysis Monitor, report and find ways to improve platform performance Work with the BI team to build visibility for key platform metrics Leverage data and insights to continually optimize to maximize value of our platform and processes Analyze data from internal and external sources to develop strategies and define platform objectives Who you are & what you??l need to succeed. 6+ years' experience working in eCommerce or Storefronts roles Strong communication, organizational, and analytical skills A keen eye for good design & understanding of user experience Having a customer first mind set and an ability to adopt design thinking principles Knowledge of tracking customer journeys and ability to analyze and utilize data Experience working with tools like Jira, Google Analytics, Hotjar, Mockups, Optimizely A strong understanding of CMS systems & how HTML/CSS/Javascript works Attention to detail, multitasking, and customer service focus Experience working in an agile organization or with cross functional teams Ability to build collaborative relationships with a diverse range of stakeholders Driven by delivery, delivering on time and to high standards Why you??l love us. We??e evolved; we provide three work environment scenarios. You can feel like a Newfolder in a work-from-home, hybrid, or work-from-the-office environment. Work-life balance. Our work is thrilling and meaningful, but we know balance is key to living well. We celebrate one another?? differences. We??e proud of our culture of diversity and inclusion. We foster a culture of belonging. Our company and customers benefit when employees bring their authentic selves to work. We have programs that bring us together on important issues and provide learning and development opportunities for all employees. We have 20 + affinity groups where you can network and connect with Newfolders globally. We care about you. We are a family, and we care about you and your family?? physical and mental health by providing competitive HMO benefits ??175k MBL with one free dependent upon one year of service! We also give out Punctuality Bonus, Generous Vacation policy, and much more! Where can we take you? We??e fans of helping our employees learn different aspects of the business, be challenged with new tasks, be mentored, and grow their careers. Unfold new possibilities with #teamnewfold!

column2: Job   Description: If you live and breathe digital marketing, we want to talk to you. We are looking for a Digital Marketing Manager to develop, implement, track and optimise our digital marketing campaigns across all digital channels  with   special   focus   on   SEO,   ORM,   liaise   with Marketing   agency,   track   Performance   Marketing,   should   know   Google   Analytics. You should have a strong grasp of current marketing tools and strategies and be able to lead integrated digital marketing campaigns from concept to execution. Design, build and optimise all digital channels including but not limited to social media, rating & reviews, influencer / partner channels etc to drive effective website traffic Have hands-on experience of ORM, Discord Community, Reddit, Quora and other forums where brand reputation is managed at global level.  Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs) and drive continuous improvement Analyse internal-external data and conduct market research to unearth market and customer insights, trends and other opportunities for campaign optimisation Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies Plan, execute, and measure experiments and conversion tests Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points Understand customer journeys to design acquisition funnels and drive new user acquisition Collaborate with agencies and other vendor partners Evaluate emerging technologies. Provide thought leadership and perspective for adoption where appropriate Experience around project management for CRM application development. Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform and motivate Experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels Experience with A/B and multivariate experiments Solid knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends) Working knowledge of ad serving tools (e.g., DART, Atlas) Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development and constraints Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement Having functional understanding of building CRM applications would be a great plus.

column2: Working Days -  Monday to Friday  Company Website   www.asmitagroup.com  WHO WE ARE: Established in 1985 by Saiyad Muzaffar Hussain, AsmitA Group is a dynamic conglomerate boasting a legacy of trust and excellence. With a primary focus on real estate, we've crafted thriving communities for over 2700 families in Mira Road, where our name resonates with quality, innovation, and unparalleled customer satisfaction. Our portfolio includes 60 residential and numerous commercial buildings, reflecting our commitment to shaping vibrant spaces. Beyond real estate, AsmitA Group extends its reach to AsmitA Club, a premier fitness destination offering a spectrum of recreational facilities. From outdoor swimming to invigorating ice baths, sauna retreats to dynamic fitness regimes, our club caters to diverse wellness needs. Venturing beyond Mira Road, we proudly steward AsmitA Organic Farms in Nagpur, India. Our farm stands as a beacon of sustainable agriculture, cultivating a rich assortment of organic delightsfrom pure ghee to aromatic spices, nourishing millets, and beyond. Committed to purity, our products bear the hallmark of organic certification in both India and the United States, a testament to our unwavering dedication to quality and authenticity. At AsmitA Organic Farms, every harvest is a testament to the enduring bond between our farmers and the land. Rigorous inspection processes ensure adherence to the highest organic standards, underscoring our reverence for nature's bounty and the tireless devotion of those who nurture it. Join us on our journey to redefine organic living, whether online or at local farmer markets, where every purchase resonates with pride and purity. Job Description : We are looking for a talented Social media coordinator to create and maintain a strong online presence for our company. Your role is to implement online marketing strategies through social media accounts.If you are a tech-savvy professional with an interest in communicating with clients through online channels, we would like to meet you. Roles and Responsibilities: Establish Asmita Group as a best-in-class content creator across social channels and digital platforms. Collaborate with Marketing stakeholders to develop and maintain an editorial calendar to support engagement, awareness and revenue goals. Contribute to paid advertising and social campaign strategy Produce highly engaging content for Asmita Group digital marketing channels (social, email) and editorial content for Asmita Group website and app, working with external resources as needed Write, edit, curate, and post content across social media, digital platforms (app & website) for both evergreen and campaign-specific projects. Engage and grow the social media community through active posting, participation and conversation. Contribute to ongoing reporting of follower growth and engagement metrics. Identify and engage key influencers and communities in the project management space for guest posts. Collaborating with your marketing teammates on campaign ideas. Build, manage, and present paid and organic social media performance reports with an emphasis on turning raw data into insights, actions, hypotheses, and testing opportunities. Lead reputation management - Coordinate initiatives and teams that support positive user reviews and assist the Customer Care team in addressing inquiries on our social platforms. Trend analysis - Performing research on current benchmark trends and audience preferences. Stay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools and applications. Social media strategy - Designing and implementing social media strategy to align with business goals. Suggest and implement new campaigns to develop brand awareness. Social media reports - Setting specific objectives and reporting on ROI. Define the most important social media KPIs. Measure the success of every social media campaign. Social media posting - Generate, edit, publish and share engaging content daily (e.g. original text, photos, videos and news). Manage and oversee social media content. Oversee social media content release on a day-to-day basis. Coordination - Collaborates with other teams, like marketing, sales, designer and customers to ensure brand consistency. Work with copywriters and designers to ensure content is informative and appealing. Social media ORM & leads - Communicate with followers, respond to queries promptlyn a timely manner and monitor customer reviews. Influencer marketing - Building brand awareness by engaging relevant influencers. Content creation - Creating social media designs on Canva as and when needed. Requirements: Minimum 1 to 5 years of experience in Social Media background. Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, mass media or a related field. Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role. Male candidates preferable. Strong familiarity with major social media platforms, their algorithms, and best practices. Excellent writing skills and the ability to adapt tone and style for different platforms. Proficiency in content creation & social media marketing tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, Hootsuite, Mailchimp, Sprout social or similar platforms. Creativity in devising engaging content ideas and campaign concepts. Basic understanding of SEO and social media trends. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, both written and verbal.

column2: Job Title : Digital Marketing Specialist Location : Noida, UP Job Type : Work from Office Requirement:  Immediate to 15 days (Apply if you are available) Must Know : AdWords, HubSpot , Google Analytics Experience : 5-8 years Exposure : US, EMEA Position Overview:  We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team. As a Digital Marketing Expert, you will be responsible for developing and implementing comprehensive digital marketing strategies across all domains of digital marketing. The ideal candidate should possess a deep understanding of various digital marketing channels and techniques, along with a proven track record of successful campaigns and projects. This role requires strong analytical skills, creativity, and the ability to stay updated with the latest trends in the digital marketing landscape. Responsibilities : Develop and execute digital marketing strategies that align      with the company's goals and objectives. Create and manage digital marketing campaigns across various      channels, including search engine marketing (SEM), search engine      optimization (SEO), social media marketing, email marketing, content      marketing, and display advertising. Conduct thorough market research and analysis to identify      target audiences, market trends, and competitors' strategies. Optimize website content and landing pages to improve organic      search rankings and drive qualified traffic. Monitor, analyze, and report on key performance indicators      (KPIs) to measure the effectiveness of digital marketing campaigns and      make data-driven decisions. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including design,      content, and development, to create compelling and engaging digital      marketing assets. Stay up to date with industry trends, emerging technologies,      and best practices in digital marketing. Utilize marketing automation tools and platforms to automate      marketing processes and enhance campaign efficiency. Identify and leverage partnerships with relevant influencers,      bloggers, and industry leaders to increase brand visibility and reach. Manage and optimize paid digital advertising campaigns,      including budget allocation, bidding strategies, and performance tracking. Qualifications : Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. A      master's degree is a plus. 5-8 years of proven experience in digital marketing, with a      strong focus on all domains of digital marketing. In-depth knowledge and understanding of digital marketing      channels, techniques, and best practices. Proficient in using digital marketing tools and platforms,      including Google Analytics, Google AdWords, social media management tools,      and marketing automation software. Demonstrated experience in developing and implementing      successful digital marketing campaigns that drive measurable results. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex      data and generate actionable insights. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with      the ability to present ideas and strategies effectively. Creative mindset and ability to think outside the box to      develop innovative digital marketing solutions. Strong project management skills with the ability to prioritize      tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Relevant certifications in digital marketing (e.g., Google Ads,      Google Analytics, HubSpot) are highly desirable. If you are a passionate digital marketing professional with a proven track record of driving successful campaigns and staying ahead of industry trends, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Join our team and contribute to our company's growth and success in the digital landscape. Please submit your resume, portfolio, and any relevant certifications to [email address]. Note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further evaluation. Note: Interested professionals can share their resume to Raghav.b@aciinfotech.com

column2: PwC AC Kolkata is hiring for Paid Social Media- Senior Associate role for our Hyderabad office. We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Associate to join our team and support building, optimizing, and reporting on paid social media campaigns. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in copywriting and asset development, with a deep understanding of various social media platforms (LinkedIn, X, Instagram, TikTok). Success in this role requires attention to detail and a strategic mindset to contribute to the firm's communications strategy.  Responsibilities:  Support the planning, development and execution of paid social media campaigns across various platforms, including but not limited to Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and TikTok  Conduct thorough research and analysis to identify market trends, and competitor strategies to inform creative and copy production, campaign planning and optimization  Build understanding of PwCs service and product offerings, translating technical concepts into content suitable for various social media channels  Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop compelling copy and creative assets that align with campaign objectives and brand guidelines  Monitor campaign performance, analyze data, and identify areas for improvement to optimize campaign effectiveness and achieve KPIs  Conduct A/B testing and implement learnings to improve campaign performance and drive higher engagement and conversion rates  Generate regular reports and provide insights on campaign performance, including key metrics, trends, and recommendations for future campaigns  Stay informed about industry best practices and emerging trends in paid social media advertising, and share knowledge with the team.  Requirements:  Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Advertising, Communications, or a related field  Proven experience (3-5 years) in building, optimizing, and reporting on paid social media campaigns  Strong copywriting skills with the ability to create engaging and persuasive content for social media platforms  Proficiency in using social media advertising platforms, such as Facebook Ads Manager, Twitter Ads, LinkedIn Campaign Manager, etc.  Solid understanding of social media analytics and tracking tools to measure campaign performance and derive actionable insights  Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions  Creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box and develop innovative campaign strategies  Strong project management skills with the ability to handle multiple campaigns simultaneously and meet deadlines  Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams and external partners  Self-motivated and proactive with a strong attention to detail?  If you are a results-oriented individual with a passion for paid social media advertising and a knack for creating compelling content, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and join our dynamic team!

column2: Requirement:  Immediate to 15 days (Apply if you are available) Must Know : AdWords, HubSpot , Google Analytics Exposure : US, EMEA Position Overview:  We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team. As a Digital Marketing Expert, you will be responsible for developing and implementing comprehensive digital marketing strategies across all domains of digital marketing. The ideal candidate should possess a deep understanding of various digital marketing channels and techniques, along with a proven track record of successful campaigns and projects. This role requires strong analytical skills, creativity, and the ability to stay updated with the latest trends in the digital marketing landscape. Responsibilities : Develop and execute digital marketing strategies that align with the company's goals and objectives. Create and manage digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including search engine marketing (SEM), search engine optimization (SEO), social media marketing, email marketing, content marketing, and display advertising. Conduct thorough market research and analysis to identify target audiences, market trends, and competitors' strategies. Optimize website content and landing pages to improve organic search rankings and drive qualified traffic. Monitor, analyze, and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the effectiveness of digital marketing campaigns and make data-driven decisions. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including design, content, and development, to create compelling and engaging digital marketing assets. Stay up to date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in digital marketing. Utilize marketing automation tools and platforms to automate marketing processes and enhance campaign efficiency. Identify and leverage partnerships with relevant influencers, bloggers, and industry leaders to increase brand visibility and reach. Manage and optimize paid digital advertising campaigns, including budget allocation, bidding strategies, and performance tracking. Qualifications : Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. A master's degree is a plus. 5-8 years of proven experience in digital marketing, with a strong focus on all domains of digital marketing. In-depth knowledge and understanding of digital marketing channels, techniques, and best practices. Proficient in using digital marketing tools and platforms, including Google Analytics, Google AdWords, social media management tools, and marketing automation software. Demonstrated experience in developing and implementing successful digital marketing campaigns that drive measurable results. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and generate actionable insights. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present ideas and strategies effectively. Creative mindset and ability to think outside the box to develop innovative digital marketing solutions. Strong project management skills with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Relevant certifications in digital marketing (e.g., Google Ads, Google Analytics, HubSpot) are highly desirable. If you are a passionate digital marketing professional with a proven track record of driving successful campaigns and staying ahead of industry trends, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Join our team and contribute to our company's growth and success in the digital landscape.

column2: Job Title: Digital Marketing expert Experience: 5+ years Location: Hyderabad  Fulfilment Type: Fulltime Job description: Application Process: Submission of an assignment and a live presentation during the interview process is compulsory. Work Timings: 2:00PM 11:00PM IST The Digital Marketing Expert will be instrumental in developing and executing comprehensive B2B digital marketing strategies to drive lead generation, enhance branding, and fuel business growth within Prolifics Corporation's offerings. Roles and Responsibilities: - Develop and execute comprehensive B2B digital marketing strategies tailored to Prolifics offerings. - Utilize LinkedIn Ads to connect with decision-makers and nurture relationships for potential business opportunities. - Manage community building and engagement across online platforms to establish Prolifics as an industry authority. - Execute targeted email marketing campaigns to drive engagement and generate leads. - Optimize business listings and SEO efforts to enhance online visibility within the B2B space. - Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to create compelling content showcasing Prolifics offerings. - Analyze campaign performance and provide insights for ongoing optimization using tools like Google Analytics. Required Skills: - Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field. - 5+ years of proven B2B digital marketing experience. - Expertise in HubSpot, ZoomInfo, LinkedIn marketing, SEO/SEM, SMM, and Google AdWords. - Experience in marketing for US Audience is must. - Experience in Prolifics's offerings is advantageous. - Strong content creation and analytical skills. - Previous involvement in B2B sectors desirable. - Excellent communication and project management skills. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): - Number of qualified leads generated. - Conversion rates from leads to sales or demos. - Increase in website traffic and engagement metrics. - Social media engagement metrics. - Brand sentiment improvement. - ROI on digital marketing campaigns. - Growth of digital presence and followers. If you are interested to know more, please send an updated copy of your resume to  pooja.paruchuri@prolifics.com About us: Prolifics Corporation Limited is a Global Technology Solutions Provider with presence across North America (USA and Canada), Europe (UK and Germany), Middle East & Asia. In India, we have off shore development centers: 3 in Hyderabad & 1 in Pune. For more than 40 years, Prolifics has transformed enterprises of all sizes including over 100 Fortune 1000 companies by solving their complex IT challenges. Our clients include Fortune 50 and Fortune 100 companies across a broad range of industries including Financial Services, Insurance, Government, Healthcare, Telecommunications, Manufacturing and Retail. We rank consistently in Dream Companies to Work For and Dream Employer of the Year ranking from World HRD Congress, ranked 7 in 2019. We encourage you to visit us on www.prolifics.com or follow us on Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube and other social media to know more about us.

column2: Role & responsibilities     As an SEO Manager, you will be responsible for developing and implementing effective search engine optimisation strategies to drive organic traffic and improve our online presence. This includes managing on-page SEO and off-page SEO activities, optimising keywords and phrases, link building and analysing web analytics data. If you have a knack for the search engine landscape to unlock online marketing potential, we would like to hear from you. You will work with talented professionals, leverage cutting-edge SEO tools and contribute to our company's growth and success. We offer attractive salary packages alongside an inclusive, mission-driven work culture that encourages exceptional professional progress. Objectives of this role Developing and executing comprehensive search engine optimisation strategies to achieve business objectives. Monitoring and analysing website performance using SEO tools and analytics platforms, providing regular reports and recommendations for optimisation. Collaborate with content creators and digital marketing teams to develop and optimise high-quality, keyword-rich content for improved organic visibility. Executing link-building activities to ensure quality links from reputable sources. Working closely with cross-functional teams, such as content, design and product, to ensure optimal content performance. Collaborating with marketing teams to integrate SEO with other digital marketing initiatives for cohesive campaigns. Your tasks Conduct thorough keyword research and SEO analysis to identify relevant target keywords and phrases. Develop and execute effective on-page and off-page SEO strategies to improve website visibility and SERP rankings. Optimise website content, meta tags, headers and URLs to ensure alignment with target keywords and enhance search engine crawlability. Identify technical SEO issues and collaborate with the web development team to implement solutions for improved website performance and user experience. Conduct SEO audits, competitive analysis and benchmarking to identify opportunities for improvement and stay ahead of competitors in search rankings. Track and analyse website traffic, user behaviour and conversion rates to assess the effectiveness of SEO strategies and make data-driven recommendations. Stay abreast of emerging SEO trends and technologies, exploring innovative approaches to enhance our SEO efforts further.   Required skills and qualifications A bachelor's degree in marketing, digital marketing or a related field. Relevant SEO certifications (such from Google, HubSpot and/or Semrush). 5+ years of experience as an SEO manager or a similar SEO-focused role. In-depth knowledge of SEO best practices, search engine algorithms and digital marketing trends, with a strong understanding of the Global search landscape. Proficiency with SEO and analytics tools like Google Search Console, SEMrush, Google Keyword Planner and Google Analytics. Knowledge of A/B testing, local SEO and SEO reporting tools. Experience with content management systems (CMS) and website optimisation platforms, like WordPress, Experience with SEO for Global businesses and Google My Business optimisation. Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Preferred skills and qualifications Basic understanding of website design, development, HTML/CSS coding, Pay Per Click (PPC) advertising and link-building strategies. Knowledge of technical SEO, including speed optimisation for web and mobile. Detail-oriented with strong organisational and project management skills. Familiarity with social media marketing and its impact on SEO. Experience with SEO testing and experimentation. Understanding of conversion rate optimisation (CRO) principles. Strong project management skills to handle multiple SEO initiatives simultaneously.
column11: SEO, Google Analytics, Keyword Analysis, Keyword Research, Email Marketing, Online Lead Generation, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Optimization, Search Engine Optimization, Affiliate Marketing, Online Marketing, Search Engine Marketing, On-page Optimization

column2: Job description   We are looking for a highly motivated and results-driven Senior Digital Marketing person whose responsibilities will include looking after end-to-end digital marketing execution i.e., SEO, SMM, PPC Ads, Email Marketing etc.  You will be involved throughout the campaign ideation, planning, implementation, measurement, and optimization process. Manage end-to-end paid campaigns across multiple digital channels, including search engines, social media platforms, display advertising, and other relevant channels.  Conduct keyword research, ad copywriting, and ad creation to maximize campaign performance.  Monitor and analyze campaign performance metrics such as click-through rates (CTR), conversion rates, return on ad spend (ROAS), and cost per acquisition (CPA).  Optimize campaigns based on data insights and make data-driven decisions to improve campaign performance.  Conduct A/B testing and implement effective strategies to continuously improve campaign performance.  Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including content, design, and analytics, to ensure campaign alignment and effectiveness. Manage and improve online content, considering SEO and Google Analytics  Measure ROI and KPIs based targets through SEM and SEO  Plan and execute outreach campaigns and lead generation campaigns  Evaluate and identify more paid marketing channels to bring quality leads  Conduct research on market trends, brand s audiences and competitors, and end-to-end consumer journey to drive engagements and conversions  Analyze digital marketing analytics reports and share insights with the team to develop optimization plans  Stay abreast of emerging digital tools and platforms, digital marketing trends, new technologies, and share insights with the rest of the team  Qualifications   Minimum 3 years of experience as a Digital Marketing Executive  3 years of hands-on experience with SEO/SEM, Google Analytics, and data analysis  Extensive experience in managing Google and Facebook Ads  Working knowledge of SEO and content marketing  Working knowledge of marketing automation and lead nurturing  Experience with tools like Ahrefs, Google Keyword Planner, Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Google Tag Manager, and email marketing tools  Familiarity with HTML/ CSS and WordPress  Critical thinker and problem-solving skills Good to have:  Working knowledge of CRMs, Campaign tools

column2: We are looking for an Assistant Manager of Digital Marketing, you will lead our efforts to enhance our brand's online presence and engagement. You will work closely with the Senior Manager - Digital Marketing to enhance our digital footprint. Role & responsibilities  :   Assist in developing and implementing a cohesive digital marketing plan to increase lead generation, brand awareness and online reputation. Analyse market trends and monitor competition to ensure effective positioning of the brand in the digital space. Smoothly execute digital marketing plans and campaigns, including SEO/SEM, email, WhatsApp, and display advertising. Manage social media channels and campaigns to reinforce our brand identity and ensure high levels of web traffic and customer engagement. Manage key performance metrics for website traffic and audience engagement. Optimization of website content for search engines and lead generation. Utilize strong analytical skills to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels. Collaborate with internal teams, including creative, content, and development, to create engaging and persuasive digital assets such as landing pages, banners, videos, and infographics. Certifications in artificial intelligence, marketing automation platforms or digital marketing are a plus. At least 3-4 years of experience in a digital marketing or advertising position. Demonstrated track record of effectively utilizing marketing automation tools Solid understanding of digital marketing concepts, including SEO, PPC, social media, content management, Video/Community building skills and web analytics. Experience with B2C social media, Google Ads, email campaigns, and SEO/SEM. Familiarity with CRM systems and their integration with marketing automation platforms.  Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform, and motivate. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. column2: Job Summary: A Digital Marketing Executive is responsible for developing, implementing, and managing digital marketing campaigns to promote a company's products, services, and brand. They utilize various online platforms, channels, and tools to reach target audiences, drive engagement, and generate leads or sales. The Digital Marketing Executive plays a key role in optimizing digital marketing strategies, analyzing performance metrics, and adapting tactics to achieve marketing objectives. Key Responsibilities: 1. Digital Strategy Development: ??Collaborate with marketing managers or senior executives to develop digital marketing strategies aligned with overall marketing objectives and business goals. ??Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and target audience preferences. ??Define target audience personas, customer segments, and key messaging strategies for digital campaigns. 2. Campaign Planning and Execution: ??Plan, execute, and optimize digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including search engines, social media, email, display advertising, and content marketing. ??Create compelling content, advertisements, and promotional materials tailored to specific target audiences and campaign objectives. ??Manage campaign budgets, schedules, and timelines to ensure timely delivery and effective utilization of resources. 3. Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and Search Engine Marketing (SEM): ??Optimize website content and structure for search engine visibility and rankings through keyword research, on-page optimization, and technical SEO. ??Manage pay-per-click (PPC) advertising campaigns on search engines (e.g., Google Ads, Bing Ads) to drive traffic, conversions, and ROI. ??Monitor and analyze campaign performance metrics, such as click-through rates, conversion rates, and cost per acquisition (CPA), to optimize campaign performance. 4. Social Media Marketing: ??Develop and execute social media marketing strategies to build brand awareness, engage audiences, and drive user engagement and interaction. ??Create and publish engaging content on social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram) to promote products, services, and brand messaging. ??Monitor social media channels, respond to customer inquiries or comments, and manage online reputation. 5. Email Marketing: ??Design and implement email marketing campaigns, including newsletters, promotional emails, and automated drip campaigns, to nurture leads and retain customers. ??Segment email lists based on audience demographics, preferences, and behaviour to deliver targeted and personalized messaging. ??Track email performance metrics, such as open rates, click-through rates, and conversion rates, and optimize campaigns for maximum effectiveness. 6. Content Marketing and Digital Asset Management: ??Develop and distribute high-quality content assets, such as blog posts, articles, whitepapers, infographics, videos, and eBooks, to engage and educate target audiences. ??Manage digital content calendars, editorial schedules, and content distribution channels to ensure consistent and timely content delivery. ??Utilize content management systems (CMS) and digital asset management (DAM) platforms to organize, publish, and optimize digital content. 7. Analytics and Reporting: ??Monitor, analyze, and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics related to digital marketing campaigns, website traffic, and user engagement. ??Use web analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics) and marketing automation platforms to track campaign performance, identify trends, and measure ROI. ??Generate regular reports, dashboards, and insights to stakeholders to evaluate campaign effectiveness and inform strategic decision-making. 8. Continuous Learning and Professional Development: ??Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in digital marketing through self-study, training programs, and participation in industry events. ??Seek opportunities for skills development and certification in digital marketing disciplines (e.g., Google Ads certification, HubSpot certification, Facebook Blueprint certification). ??Experiment with new digital marketing techniques, tools, and platforms to enhance campaign performance and drive innovation. Qualifications: ??Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field. ??Proven experience in digital marketing roles, with demonstrated success in developing and executing digital marketing campaigns. ??Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms, including Google Analytics, Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, LinkedIn Ads, Twitter Ads, and email marketing software. ??Strong analytical skills and data-driven decision-making capabilities. ??Excellent communication, writing, and creative skills. ??Ability to multitask, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. ??Attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work. ??Team player with strong collaboration and interpersonal skills. ??Adaptability and willingness to learn new skills and technologies in the ever-evolving field of digital marketing.
column11: Digital Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Marketing, SEO, Social Media Optimization

column2: Eligibility Criteria                Fluency in English is essential for this position. Candidates who cannot understand or speak English fluently should refrain from applying.     We prefer candidates who demonstrate a strong intellectual capacity and possess a good IQ.We are seeking highly intelligent and talented candidates who can excel in their roles.     While it is not mandatory, candidates who have achieved a minimum score of 60% in both their 10th and 12th standard examinations, or a minimum of 80% in either the 10th or 12th standard examination, are given preferential consideration.     In-depth knowledge of various digital marketing channels, including social media, SEO, SEM, email marketing, content marketing, and display advertising.     Proficiency in using digital marketing platforms, CRM systems, and marketing automation tools.     Solid knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics) and SEO principles.     In-depth knowledge of SEO best practices, search engine algorithms, and ranking factors.     Experience with SEO tools and platforms, such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Moz, SEMrush, and Ahrefs.     Knowledge of HTML and CSS will be benefitted.     Only experienced candidates with a minimum experience of 3 years as Digital Marketing Expert (or similar) are preferred.     For this position, we hire only male candidates. Female candidates are kindly requested not to apply.     Student applications will not be accepted.     Individuals needing notice periods exceeding 15 days before departing from their current company are ineligible to apply.     Applicants must be at least 18 years old.     Applicants must be an Indian Citizen.               Roles and Responsibilities            Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies to achieve brand objectives and drive business growth.     Plan, implement, and optimize digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including social media, search engines, email marketing, and display advertising.     Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify target audiences, industry trends, and effective marketing tactics.     Manage and monitor website performance, SEO, and user experience to improve online visibility and organic search rankings.     Create engaging and compelling content for digital platforms, including websites, blogs, social media, and email newsletters.     Monitor and analyze key performance metrics, track campaign performance, and provide regular reports to evaluate the effectiveness of digital marketing initiatives. column2: Overview: As a Digital Marketing Expert, you will be responsible for developing and implementing digital marketing strategies to drive online traffic, engagement, and conversions for our company. Your role involves leveraging various digital channels and platforms to enhance brand visibility, attract target audiences, and optimize marketing campaigns for maximum effectiveness. Responsibilities: 1. Digital Strategy Development: Develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies aligned with business objectives, target audience demographics, and market trends to achieve measurable results. 2. Content Creation: Create engaging and relevant content for digital marketing campaigns, including website content, blog posts, social media posts, email newsletters, and advertising copy, tailored to different audience segments and platforms. 3. Social Media Management: Manage company profiles on social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn) to increase brand awareness, foster engagement with followers, and drive traffic to the company website. 4. Search Engine Optimization (SEO): Optimize website content and structure for search engines to improve organic search rankings, increase website visibility, and attract qualified traffic through relevant keywords and metadata optimization. 5. Pay-Per-Click (PPC) Advertising: Plan, execute, and optimize PPC advertising campaigns across platforms such as Google Ads, Bing Ads, and social media advertising networks to drive targeted traffic and conversions within allocated budgets. 6. Email Marketing: Develop and execute email marketing campaigns to nurture leads, promote products or services, and engage with subscribers through personalized email content, segmentation, and automation. 7. Analytics and Reporting: Monitor, analyze, and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics related to digital marketing campaigns, website traffic, social media engagement, and conversion rates to assess performance and identify opportunities for optimization. Requirements: 1. Education: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Digital Marketing, Communications, or related field preferred. 2. Experience: 2-3 years of experience in digital marketing roles, with a proven track record of successful digital campaigns and demonstrated expertise in digital marketing channels and tools. 3. Technical Skills: Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms, including Google Analytics, Google Ads, social media management tools (e.g., Hootsuite, Buffer), email marketing software (e.g., Mailchimp, Constant Contact), and content management systems (e.g., WordPress). 4. Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and quantitative skills to interpret data, track performance metrics, and make data-driven decisions to optimize marketing strategies and tactics. 5. Creativity: Creative thinking and problem-solving skills to develop innovative digital marketing campaigns and content that resonate with target audiences and drive engagement. 6. Adaptability: Ability to adapt to changing priorities, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Note: This job description outlines the primary duties and requirements for the Digital Marketing Expert position but may be subject to change based on the specific needs of the company and industry trends.

column2: Genelec  is the global leader in the design and manufacturing of loudspeakers for both professional and home applications. Founded in Finland in 1978, our customers include the worlds finest recording studios, broadcasters and public spaces, complemented by a rapidly growing community of customers creating and enjoying music at home. We are a company driven by purpose, innovation and passion, with high ethical standards and a total commitment to quality and sustainability  We are now looking to strengthen our team with the addition of a Digital Marketing and Sales Analyst, who will form a key part of our highly focused marketing and sales team. This is a unique opportunity to bring your skill and creativity to one of the worlds most highly respected audio companies. As Digital Marketing and Sales Analyst you will be responsible for researching, executing and measuring the success of a range of digital marketing and sales activities, including SEO, SEM, search-analyse-utilize of data, and marketing and sales automation. Youll have advanced knowledge of data analysis techniques in digital platforms and use these to help create excellent users experience and drive user engagement across all of our digital media channels. Youll need to be an open-minded and highly collaborative team player, since youll be working very closely with our global marketing media, marketing communications and sales and technology teams.  Youll need to be able to work systematically, to a very high standard and occasionally to very tight deadlines. Youll also be striving to understand our customers needs, cultural diversity, behaviours and emotions in order to produce campaigns that truly resonate with our audience. In return well offer you a meaningful and satisfying job in a future-oriented, international, dynamic, and inspiring working environment. Your colleagues will be passionate, professional and performance-oriented, and in this position youll have an excellent opportunity to develop your professional skills. Skills and qualifications required include: Bachelors Degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Marketing, or a related field. Minimum of two (2) years of experience in the field of digital marketing analysis. Experience of setting up and interpreting analytics, campaign tracking and report design. Proficiency in managing digital marketing and sales programs including social media, SEO, paid search and display ads. Experience using SEO methods, including keyword audits and list building, metadata analysis, URL structure and link building. Proficiency in Google AdWords and Google Analytics. Experience with marketing and sales automation platforms and their reporting suites. Strong organizational skills and attention to detail. Knowledge of the professional audio industry is not mandatory, but a valuable advantage. Please send your application with CV, design portfolio and salary expectations by 25 th of November 2022 to Paula Ruotsalainen paula.ruotsalainen@genelec.com Please use Digital Marketing and Sales Analyst as the mail subject.  Please note that we will review all the applications anonymously so please write you contact information only in your message but not in your application or CV!  If you require further information about this role, or the work involved, please contact adriana.tovar@genelec.com

column2: Job Description We are looking for a highly analytical Paid Media expert. Create and manage campaigns on Google Ads (Search, Display, Video), Facebook Ads Manager, Bing Ads, Quora Ads & Linkedin Ads Manager. Have a knack for on-page and off-page SEO & an overall understanding of Digital Marketing. Requirements Experience and Qualifications: A Degree or Course in Digital Marketing is preferred. Excellent control on - Keyword Bidding, Ad copy writing, Re-marketing, Keyword match-type strategies & Landing page testing. Strong analytical background, with a great understanding of Google Analytics Good with numbers & logic (not math) to reverse calculate spends based on goals for media buying. Preferred to have basic knowledge of WordPress, Email & SMS Marketing & Marketing Automation on CRMs. ?Eligibility: Minimum 3-4 years of experience in Ads execution Comfortable working from the office -  Mumbai

column2: Position  - Digital Marketing Specialist   Experience  - 5+ years  Location  - Gurgaon / Jaipur Summary   We are looking for a skilled and enthusiastic Digital Marketing Specialist to work with our Marketing team and drive growth for our business. The ideal candidate will possess a comprehensive understanding of SEO, SMM, Designing and Content Writing. He/she will be responsible for implementing marketing strategies and demonstrating strong managerial skills. Job Responsibilities Develop and execute marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, and drive growth for our business.  Lead a team of marketers and work with cross-functional teams to achieve marketing goals. Make sure the team is fed with creative ideas and the content posted as a blog, vlog, reel, tweet, post etc., is top quality and aligns with brand language.  Conduct thorough keyword research to identify opportunities for improving website visibility and search engine rankings. Implement on-page and off-page SEO techniques to enhance organic traffic. Manage social media accounts across various platforms including Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, and others. Create engaging content calendars, schedule posts, and monitor social media analytics to optimize performance.  Continuously monitor and report on marketing performance metrics and adjust strategies as necessary. Provide guidance, feedback, and support to the Marketing team to develop their skills. Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in marketing. Identify and implement new marketing channels and tactics to drive growth.  Overall not just an executor but someone creative, self-motivated and driven to take on marketing passionately and is fearless in trying new ideas and voicing them to management.  Skills Required Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field  Master's degree preferred. At least 5+ years of experience in a senior marketing role. Proven track record of developing and executing successful marketing strategies. Strong ability to manage a team effectively. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Analytical mindset to make informed decisions. Experience with marketing automation platforms, CRM tools, and web analytics tools.  About Concret.io Founded in 2014 by Abhinav Gupta & Anjana Gupta, Concretio came to life with a vision to create a team that thrives on challenges and loves to innovate. Learning Never Stops Here: We believe in growing every day. That's why we fully fund certifications and offer extensive training in both tech and soft skills, ensuring our team excels in every aspect. You're in Charge: The expectation will be to own 100% success and failure for the allocated task/responsibility. We are never short on public praise and giving credit for a successful show.  Aiming for Excellence: We aim for the best. Quality and clear communication are non-negotiables.

column2: Role & responsibilities     We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for digital marketing and a track record of driving successful campaigns across various digital channels. As a Digital Marketing Specialist, you will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing our digital marketing strategies to promote our products/services and grow our online presence. Key Responsibilities: Develop Digital Marketing Strategies: Develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, drive website traffic, and generate leads/sales. Manage Digital Campaigns: Plan, execute, and optimize digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including but not limited to email, social media, search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click (PPC), and display advertising. Content Creation: Create engaging and high-quality content for digital platforms, including website, blog, social media, and email campaigns. Social Media Management: Manage and grow our social media presence on platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, and others. Develop and execute social media campaigns to engage our target audience and drive meaningful interactions. SEO and SEM: Optimize website content and structure for search engines (SEO) to improve organic search rankings. Manage pay-per-click (PPC) advertising campaigns to drive traffic and conversions. Create and manage digital campaigns and generate leads through organic and paid techniques with high value content marketing Coordinate with Cross team, vendors and Clients to achieve customer satisfaction and improve efficiency Use top Marketing frameworks for Go-To-Market Strategy like Target group, ideal customer persona, marketing calendar, defining 7 P's and more. Analytics and Reporting: Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to track the effectiveness of digital marketing efforts. Prepare regular reports and provide insights to improve campaign performance and ROI. Stay Updated: Stay abreast of the latest trends, best practices, and technologies in digital marketing. Continuously evaluate and recommend new digital channels and strategies to reach our target audience and achieve business objectives. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field. Proven work experience of 3-5 years as a Digital Marketing Specialist or similar role. In-depth knowledge of digital marketing channels, tools, and techniques. Experience with web analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics) and digital marketing platforms (e.g., Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager). Strong analytical skills and data-driven mindset. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities. Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

column2: The Digital marketing specialist position is responsible for the digital marketing activities for covering the following key areas:   1. The position is responsible for supporting the conceptualization, design and delivery of SEO and social media strategies for clients to ensure the success of their campaigns.   2. Perform keyword research in coordination with client business objectives to optimize existing content and uncover new opportunities.               3. Provide SEO analysis and recommendations in coordination with elements and structure of websites and web pages.   4. Provide recommendations and execute strategies for social media marketing, content development in coordination with SEO goals - general and keyword specific.   5. Administer search engine programs (XML sitemaps, shopping feeds, webmaster tools) for purposes of diagnostic reporting on client projects.    6. Help to create and support marketing campaigns and content to socialize and use for social media purposes (e.g. customer videos briefs, customer case studies, blog posts, posts from analysts and customers).         7. Implement link building campaigns in coordination with client SEO goals. Assist in the development and execution of communication/content strategies via social communities in coordination with SEO goals.   8. Keep pace with SEO, search engine, social media and internet marketing industry trends and developments. Research and administer social media tools in support of clients social media strategy on Facebook, Linked In and other Social Networking Websites.     Set the trend as a leading digital marketing agency in Mumbai          9. Monitor and administer web analytics dashboards, reports and key reporting tools, and point out key areas of importance in accordance with client goals. Monitor and evaluate search results and search performance across the major search channels.    10. Work closely with the other team members to meet client goals. Evaluate the effectiveness of all online marketing programs, draw conclusions and develop recommendations based on results on a timely basis.       Requirements       1. Proficiency in MS Excel, PowerPoint, and Word.   2. Skills to manage full-fledged SEO and social media campaigns, Website analysis, On-page optimization System Optimization, social media posting will be Daily tasks.   3. Candidate should be passionate about search engine technologies, web technologies the latest trends.   4. Skilled in Internet Marketing, Social Media optimization     and marketing         5. Knowledge of HTML/CSS and website administrations (good to have).         6. 2-5 year work experience with any other digital marketing agency in Mumbai

column2: We are searching for a highly - creative Digital Marketing Manager to lead our sales and marketing team. In this position, you will be responsible for all aspects of our marketing operations. Your central goal is to help grow our brands influence globally while also increasing brand loyalty and awareness.     Your duties will include planning, implementing, and monitoring our digital marketing advertising campaigns across all digital networks. Our ideal candidate is someone with experience in marketing, art direction, and social media management. In addition to being an outstanding communicator, you will also demonstrate excellent interpersonal and analytical skills.       Responsibilities:         Design and oversee all aspects of our digital marketing department including our marketing database, email, and display advertising campaigns.     Develop and monitor campaign budgets.     Plan and manage our social media platforms.     Prepare accurate reports on our marketing campaign s overall performance.     Coordinate with advertising and media experts to improve marketing results.     Identify the latest trends and technologies affecting our industry.     Evaluate important metrics that affect our website traffic, service quotas, and target audience.     Work with your team to brainstorm new and innovative growth strategies.     Oversee and manage all contests, giveaways, and other digital projects.         Requirements:         Bachelor s degree in Marketing/ BTech / BE, etc. or relevant field.     A minimum of 3 to 5 years experience in a digital marketing or advertising position.     In-depth knowledge of video editing, various social media platforms, best practices, and website analytics.     Highly creative with excellent analytical abilities.     Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills.     Up-to-date on the latest trends and technologies in digital marketing.     5 yearsexperience in B2B digital marketing and advertising     Demonstrable experience with email marketing, lead generation and SEO.     Candidates must be a good learner and ready to learn the company business process first and then start working on the marketing strategies.     It is essential the candidate must have an extremely can do attitude and should be able to motivated the team with a can do attitude.      Should have good experience in creating creative Marketing Advertisements. Including experience in Photoshop/Illustrator/After Effects, Graphic Artist, Graphic Design, Motion Graphic, 3D Modelling, 3D Max, Print Graphics, 3D Designer, Graphic Rendering and Visulation, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

column2: About Us:  Uncodemy IT Training Institute is a prominent name in the IT training and certification industry. Our commitment to excellence has made us a leader in empowering individuals with the skills needed to succeed in the ever-evolving IT sector. With a team of experts and a cutting-edge curriculum, we ensure our students receive top-notch education. Job Description: Are you passionate about digital marketing and SEO? Do you have a strong desire to learn and grow in the field of search engine optimization? If so, Uncodemy IT Training Institute is looking for SEO Interns and Executives to join our dynamic team. Responsibilities: As an SEO Intern & Executive at Uncodemy, you will have the opportunity to: Keyword Research:  Conduct keyword research to identify opportunities for organic traffic growth. Social Media:  Optimize social media profiles for SEO and assist in social media marketing efforts. Qualifications: Strong interest in digital marketing and SEO. Basic understanding of SEO principles is a plus. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Highly organized with attention to detail. Ability to work in a team and independently. Why Choose Uncodemy: Training and Development:  We provide extensive training and mentorship to help you grow in your SEO career. Hands-On Experience:  You'll have the opportunity to work on real projects and gain practical SEO experience. Career Growth:  We believe in promoting talent from within, and exceptional performers can expect rapid career advancement. Collaborative Culture:  Join a team of passionate individuals who are dedicated to helping you succeed. Competitive Compensation:  We offer competitive salaries and benefits packages.

column2: SEO Executive Job Description We are looking for a result-driven SEO executive to be responsible for developing optimized web content. The SEO executive's responsibilities include working closely with the marketing team to achieve SEO objectives, measuring the success of SEO and ROI, and assisting with the maintenance of the website's architecture to ensure user friendliness. To be successful as an SEO executive, you should have strong copywriting and analytical skills, knowledge of coding techniques, and a commitment to constantly improving on key skills. Ultimately, an SEO executive should have outstanding knowledge of SEO, passion for the industry and time management skills. SEO Executive Responsibilities: Conducting on-site and off-site analysis of web SEO competition. Using google analytics to conduct performance reports regularly. Creating high-quality SEO content. Assisting with blog content. Leading keyword research and optimization of content. Keeping up-to-date with developments in SEM. Social Media Marketing. SEO Executive Requirements: Proven SEO, SMO experience Proven SEM experience managing PPC campaigns across Google, Yahoo and Bing. Solid understanding of performance marketing, conversion, and online customer acquisition In-depth experience with website analytics tools (e.g, Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends) Marketing degree or related. Extensive experience in SEO. Working knowledge of Google Analytics. Experience with coding techniques. Thorough understanding of web design and site structures. Good knowledge of back link analysis. Perks and benefits   PF/ESI Medical Insurance

column2: Greetings from Home Bazaar Services Pvt Ltd. Who are we?   Home Bazaar Services Pvt Ltd is the leading Property Advisor in India which has tuned and upgraded with each and every scratch of the real estate sector. With past experience and immense exposure to this service, we understand the needs of customers and strive hard to meet the same. With the help of the most experienced support system, Homebazaar.com has gone a long way to achieving success in a short span of time. We have also been awarded the best-winning property service company in Mumbai for the Quarter 2022 - 2023. Also have expanded our routes in Bangalore & Pune region.   www.homebazaar.com What is our requirement? Role:  Digital Marketing Specialist Experience:  Minimum 1+ years Location:  Vashi (Navi Mumbai)(Work From Office) Roles & Responsibilities: Design and oversee all aspects of campaign management including search and display advertising campaigns on Google & Facebook. Adept in working with keyword research tools like Google keyword planner or SEM Rush. Create campaign structure in-line with the market practices, expand the keyword reach and continue to optimize the campaign with removal of negative keywords to optimize campaigns on agreed KPIs. Develop and monitor campaign budgets, ensure other KPIs like CPM / CPC / CPL / CPSV / CAC are kept under a check and assessed against the AOPs and MOPs. Prepare accurate reports on our marketing campaigns overall performance. Keep a close eye on bottom funnel; implement the learning in future campaigns. Build and maintain our impression share, maintain a steady SoV. Identify trends and insights, and optimize spend and performance based on the generated insights. Plan, execute, and measure experiments and conversion tests & brainstorm new and creative growth strategies with the brand team. Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages, campaign creatives and optimize user experience, get the best return on every advertising rupee spent. Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across digital touch points. Collaborate with agencies and other vendor partners Requirements: Someone who has managed 1 lacs (Minimum) of monthly budget. 1+ Years hands on experience in digital media planning and buying. (Ad Ops) Understanding of Ad-Ops - Audience Research (STP) or Keyword Research, Creative Development Process, Creating and Executing Campaigns. Candidate only from Digital Media / Performance Marketing Agency background will be preferred. Rich experience in acquiring high quality leads. Identification and diversification of lead sources. Salary Offered: Fixed Salary + Yearly Increment(Performance Based)
