column2: Responsibilities: Develop and execute digital marketing strategies to enhance brand awareness, customer engagement, and lead generation for automotive products and services. Manage digital channels, including company websites, social media platforms, email marketing, and online advertising campaigns, to drive traffic and engagement. Implement search engine optimization (SEO) techniques to improve the visibility and ranking of automotive websites in search engine results pages (SERPs). Analyze digital performance metrics, such as website traffic, conversion rates, and social media engagement, to assess the effectiveness of digital marketing efforts and identify areas for improvement. Utilize customer relationship management (CRM) systems to segment audiences, personalize communications, and nurture leads throughout the automotive customer journey. Oversee the creation of digital content, including blog posts, articles, videos, and social media posts, to engage automotive audiences and drive brand loyalty. Collaborate with internal teams, such as product management, sales, and customer service, to align digital engagement strategies with overall business goals and initiatives. Stay informed about industry trends, emerging technologies, and digital best practices in the automotive sector to inform strategic decision-making and innovation. Manage relationships with external agencies, vendors, and partners to support digital marketing initiatives, including creative development, media buying, and performance tracking. Monitor digital marketing budgets, expenses, and return on investment (ROI) to ensure cost-effective allocation of resources and achievement of key performance indicators (KPIs). Requirements: Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, business administration, or related field. Proven experience in digital marketing, preferably within the automotive industry or related sectors. Strong understanding of digital marketing channels, techniques, and tools, including SEO, SEM, social media, email marketing, and content management systems (CMS). Proficiency in web analytics platforms, such as Google Analytics or Adobe Analytics, to track and analyze digital performance metrics. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to convey complex concepts and data-driven insights to diverse audiences. Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data, identify trends, and make data-driven recommendations for optimization. Creative thinking and problem-solving skills to develop innovative digital engagement strategies and campaigns. Project management skills to manage multiple priorities, deadlines, and stakeholders in a fast-paced environment. Knowledge of automotive industry trends, consumer behavior, and competitive landscape is a plus. Flexibility to adapt to changing business needs and priorities, as well as a passion for continuous learning and professional development in the digital marketing field.

column2: Elephion is a dynamic and innovative advertising agency specializing in delivering impactful digital marketing solutions to a diverse range of clients. With a focus on creativity, strategic thinking, and cutting-edge technology, we help brands achieve their marketing goals and stand out in the digital landscape.   Position Overview We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Digital Marketing Executive to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing complete brand accountability, from communications and planning to execution and results. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work on diverse projects, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and drive measurable impact for our clients.     Key Responsibilities   Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies to achieve client objectives and KPIs. Manage all aspects of digital campaigns, including planning, budgeting, implementation, and optimization. Oversee the creation and execution of engaging content across various digital platforms, including social media, websites, email, and more. Monitor campaign performance and analyze data to identify insights, trends, and opportunities for optimization. Collaborate closely with creative, design, and development teams to ensure alignment and consistency across all digital touchpoints. Stay up-to-date with the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in digital marketing and advertising. Foster strong client relationships through proactive communication, strategic guidance, and delivering exceptional results. Prepare and present campaign reports and performance insights to clients and internal stakeholders.   Qualifications   Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field. Proven experience in digital marketing, preferably within an advertising agency or similar fast-paced environment. Strong understanding of digital marketing channels, platforms, and tools, including but not limited to social media, SEM, SEO, email marketing, and analytics. Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, draw insights, and make data-driven decisions. Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities with a keen eye for detail and design. Exceptional communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate complex ideas clearly and persuasively. Ability to thrive in a collaborative team environment while also taking ownership of individual projects and responsibilities. Demonstrated passion for digital marketing, advertising, and driving business results.   Why Join Us At Elephion, you'll have the opportunity to work with a talented team of professionals who are passionate about creativity, innovation, and making a real impact for our clients. We offer competitive compensation, ongoing training and development opportunities, and a dynamic work environment where your ideas and contributions are valued and recognized.   If you're ready to take your digital marketing career to the next level and make a difference in the world of advertising, we'd love to hear from you. Apply now to join our team! Send your CV's at careers@elephion.com

column2: Position Summary:  Equity Planners is seeking a skilled and experienced Digital Marketing Executive-SEO to join  our dynamic team and lead the optimization of our digital footprint. The ideal candidate will  possess a profound understanding of search engine optimization strategies and techniques,  coupled with a proven track record of enhancing online visibility and driving organic traffic.  In this role, you will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to devise and execute  SEO strategies tailored to our diverse clientele. Your responsibilities will encompass  conducting comprehensive SEO audits, keyword research, on-page and off-page  optimization, and performance analysis to ensure continual enhancement in search engine  rankings. If you have a fervor for SEO, a penchant for data analysis, and a zeal for delivering  tangible results, we encourage you to apply for this stimulating opportunity.    Job Duties (Other Duties as Assigned):  ??Conduct thorough SEO audits and analysis to pinpoint opportunities for optimization and  enhancement across web and mobile platforms.  ??Perform meticulous keyword research to identify high-value target keywords and phrases.  ??Develop and implement on-page optimization strategies, including optimizing website  content, meta tags, and URL structures.  ??Execute off-page optimization tactics such as link building, content promotion, and  outreach to augment domain authority and elevate search engine rankings.  ??Monitor and analyze website performance metrics, encompassing traffic, rankings, and  conversion rates, utilizing tools such as Google Analytics and Google Search Console.  ??Stay abreast of the latest trends and best practices in SEO and search engine algorithms.  ??Collaborate with content creators, developers, and designers to ensure seamless  integration of SEO best practices into all facets of website development and content  creation.  ??Furnish regular reporting and insights on SEO performance to internal stakeholders and  clients.  ??Continuously refine SEO strategies based on performance data and industry trends to drive  sustainable growth and accomplish business objectives.    Qualifications (Education/Experience/Certifications):  ??Minimum 6 month to 2 years of experience in SEO management, preferably in a digital agency    or analogous environment.  ??Proficiency in SEO tools and software such as SEMrush, Moz, Ahrefs, Screaming Frog, PHP,    HTML, and CSS.  ??Strong understanding of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and SEO best practices.  ??Bachelors degree in marketing, communications, or a related field preferred.  ??Excellent analytical skills with the ability to decipher data and derive actionable insights.  ??Effective communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to articulate  complex concepts clearly and succinctly.  ??Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering top-notch work within tight deadlines.  ??Proven track record of driving organic search traffic and enhancing search engine rankings.  ??Ability to collaborate effectively in a cross-functional team environment.  ??Experience with local SEO, international SEO, technical SEO, and Wordpress is  advantageous.  To be considered for this role, candidates must provide evidence of past SEO successes and  demonstrate a solid understanding of SEO principles.

column2: Greetings from Home Bazaar Services Pvt Ltd. Who are we?   Home Bazaar Services Pvt Ltd is the leading Property Advisor in India which has tuned and upgraded with each and every scratch of the real estate sector. With past experience and immense exposure to this service, we understand the needs of customers and strive hard to meet the same. With the help of the most experienced support system, Homebazaar.com has gone a long way to achieving success in a short span of time. We have also been awarded the best-winning property service company in Mumbai for the Quarter 2022 - 2023. Also have expanded our routes in Bangalore & Pune region.   www.homebazaar.com What is our requirement? Role:  Digital Marketing Specialist Experience:  Minimum 1+ years Location:  Vashi (Navi Mumbai)(Work From Office) Roles & Responsibilities: Design and oversee all aspects of campaign management including search and display advertising campaigns on Google & Facebook. Adept in working with keyword research tools like Google keyword planner or SEM Rush. Create campaign structure in-line with the market practices, expand the keyword reach and continue to optimize the campaign with removal of negative keywords to optimize campaigns on agreed KPIs. Develop and monitor campaign budgets, ensure other KPIs like CPM / CPC / CPL / CPSV / CAC are kept under a check and assessed against the AOPs and MOPs. Prepare accurate reports on our marketing campaigns overall performance. Keep a close eye on bottom funnel; implement the learning in future campaigns. Build and maintain our impression share, maintain a steady SoV. Identify trends and insights, and optimize spend and performance based on the generated insights. Plan, execute, and measure experiments and conversion tests & brainstorm new and creative growth strategies with the brand team. Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages, campaign creatives and optimize user experience, get the best return on every advertising rupee spent. Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across digital touch points. Collaborate with agencies and other vendor partners Requirements: Someone who has managed 1 lacs (Minimum) of monthly budget. 1+ Years hands on experience in digital media planning and buying. (Ad Ops) Understanding of Ad-Ops - Audience Research (STP) or Keyword Research, Creative Development Process, Creating and Executing Campaigns. Candidate only from Digital Media / Performance Marketing Agency background will be preferred. Rich experience in acquiring high quality leads. Identification and diversification of lead sources. Salary Offered: Fixed Salary + Yearly Increment(Performance Based)

column2: A digital marketing job description typically includes responsibilities related to developing, implementing, and managing online marketing strategies to promote products or services.   Developing Digital Marketing Strategies : Create comprehensive digital marketing plans aligned with business goals, target audience, and budget. Content Creation and Management : Produce engaging content for various digital channels such as websites, blogs, social media, email campaigns, and online advertisements. Manage content calendars and ensure consistency across platforms. Search Engine Optimization  (SEO): Optimize website content, structure, and performance to improve organic search rankings and drive targeted traffic. Social Media Management : Manage social media accounts, create content calendars, and implement strategies to increase engagement, followers, and brand awareness. Paid Advertising : Plan, execute, and optimize online advertising campaigns across platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, LinkedIn Ads, etc. Monitor campaign performance and adjust strategies as needed to maximize ROI. Email Marketing : Develop email marketing campaigns, including designing templates, writing copy, segmenting audiences, and analyzing campaign results to optimize performance. Analytics and Reporting : Utilize analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, social media analytics) to track and analyze digital marketing performance metrics. Prepare regular reports and provide insights to stakeholders. Website Management : Oversee website updates, maintenance, and optimization to ensure a positive user experience and support digital marketing objectives. Stay Updated on Industry Trends : Keep abreast of the latest digital marketing trends, tools, and best practices. Make recommendations for incorporating new techniques or technologies into digital marketing strategies  Preferred candidate profile     3+ years of working experience in Digital Marketing Bachelor's degree Proven experience in digital marketing, with a strong understanding of various online marketing channels and techniques. Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms such as Google Analytics, SEO tools, social media management tools, email marketing software, etc. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and draw actionable insights. Creative thinking and problem-solving skills. Ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively in a team environment 6 days working Work timings: 10 AM  6 PM

column2: Job Summary: We are seeking a highly motivated and creative individual to join our team as a Junior Digital Marketing Executive.  This role will involve assisting in the development and implementation of digital marketing campaigns across various online platforms.  The ideal candidate should have a passion for digital marketing, excellent communication skills, and a strong understanding of current digital marketing trends. Responsibilities: Assist in the creation and execution of digital marketing campaigns across multiple channels including social media, email, and display advertising. Monitor and analyse the performance of campaigns using analytics tools such as Google Analytics and provide insights and recommendations for optimization. Collaborate with the marketing team to develop engaging content for digital channels, including social media posts, blog articles, and email newsletters. Help maintain and update the company website with fresh and relevant content, ensuring SEO best practices are followed. Support the planning and execution of online events, webinars, and other digital initiatives. Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing and share knowledge with the team. Assist with the creation and management of digital advertising campaigns, including keyword research, ad copywriting, and budget management. Coordinate with external agencies and vendors as needed for design, development, and other digital marketing activities. Provide regular reports and analysis on the performance of digital marketing efforts, including key metrics and KPIs. Assist in other marketing-related tasks and projects as assigned. Requirements : Previous experience or internship in digital marketing preferred. Strong understanding of digital marketing concepts and best practices. Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite, Google Analytics, and other digital marketing tools. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Ability to multitask and prioritise tasks in a fast-paced environment. Detail-oriented with strong analytical skills. Creative thinker with the ability to generate new ideas and solutions. Team player with a positive attitude and willingness to learn. Basic knowledge of HTML/CSS and web design principles is a plus. Working Days  - Mon - Friday Join our team and be part of an exciting journey in digital marketing!

column2: Role & responsibilities    We are seeking an enthusiastic and creative Digital Marketing Associate to join our fast-growing electric two-wheeler company. In this role, you will be responsible for supporting the digital marketing efforts, including social media management, content creation, email marketing, and website optimization. You will work closely with the marketing team to execute campaigns that drive brand awareness, lead generation, and customer engagement.  Social Media Management : Assist in developing and executing social media strategies across platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn. Create engaging content (text, images, videos) to promote our electric two-wheeler products and brand. Monitor social media channels, respond to comments and messages, and engage with the online community. Analyze social media metrics and provide reports on performance and insights. Content Creation: Contribute to the development of content calendars and content strategies. Write compelling and SEO-friendly content for the website, blog, and other digital platforms. Create visually appealing graphics, infographics, and video content to support marketing campaigns. Email Marketing: Assist in designing and executing email marketing campaigns, including newsletters, promotional offers, and lead nurturing sequences. Collaborate with the team to develop engaging email content and optimize subject lines, calls-to-action, and layouts. Monitor email campaign performance and provide insights for improvement. Website Optimization: Support the optimization of the company's website for better user experience and search engine visibility. Assist in conducting keyword research, on-page SEO, and content optimization efforts. Analyze website metrics and provide recommendations for improvement. Campaign Execution and Analytics: Participate in the planning and execution of digital marketing campaigns, including promotional activities and product launches. Monitor campaign performance using various analytics tools and provide regular reports. Identify areas for improvement and suggest data-driven strategies for optimization.   Skills: Strong writing and communication skills. Basic knowledge of digital marketing principles, including social media, content marketing, email marketing, and SEO. Familiarity with digital marketing tools and analytics platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, social media management tools). Excellent organizational and time management skills. Creativity and an eye for design. Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.

Be a part of the Marketing Operations team that is leading the managed services arm of Accenture. We power our client's business through the integration of insights, data, and technology. We are focused on activating and scaling the best brand experiences, to deliver breakthrough marketing-led growth, cost-effectively, across all digital consumer touchpoints and channels. column2: Location: Bhopal/Navi Mumbai Industry: Emerging Technologies (IoT) Employment Type: Full Time, Permanent Salary:  4 .5 - 6.5 LPA Benefits & Perks: Medical Insurance worth  Rs. 2 lac Office Timings: 9:00 AM to 6:30 PM, Monday to Saturday About Us Embark on an exciting journey with Ajjas, where we're reshaping the two-wheeler industry and unlocking the potential of India's thriving e-commerce market. As we forge ahead to create India's largest online two-wheeler community, we're on a mission to make every ride SMART and SAFE. With an incredible $2.2 billion opportunity in India, the road to success is wide open, and we invite you to be a part of this exhilarating journey! Responsibilities Marketplace Management:  Navigate the landscape of platforms like Flipkart and Amazon, ensuring seamless operations, managing product listings, addressing inquiries, and elevating overall marketplace quality. Drive sales initiatives to propel the company to new heights. Inventory Management:  Keep optimal stock levels across Amazon/Flipkart warehouses, monitor turnover, and uphold accuracy. Catalog Maintenance:  Curate and organize product catalogs, compose compelling descriptions, optimize images, and categorize products strategically. Promotions and Offers:  Develop and manage promotions to boost sales, collaborating with the Marketplace Accounts Manager. Collaborative Problem Solving:  Work closely with the Marketplace Accounts Manager to troubleshoot issues, identify bottlenecks, and propose effective solutions. Competitor Analysis:  Monitor competitor pricing and strategies, providing data-driven recommendations to refine our approach. Customer Satisfaction:  Investigate and resolve customer complaints, ensuring a positive brand image. Reporting & Presentations:  Compile reports, create engaging presentations, and offer insights into performance. What We Offer  Join Ajjas on an exhilarating journey towards a $2.2 billion opportunity. A substantial part of this journey involves navigating the dynamic waters of online sales with marketplace giants like Amazon and Flipkart. This isn't just a job; it's your golden ticket to exponential growth and well-deserved recognition. Here's What Awaits You  Limitless Growth:  Propel your career to new heights in the dynamic world of e-commerce. There's no ceiling, only limitless potential. Recognition & Rewards:  Celebrate achievements and milestones, big and small. Innovation & Impact:  Thrive in a company that values innovation, where your ideas shape the future. Supportive Team:  We're a tight-knit family, working together to achieve greatness. SMART & SAFE:  Join us in making every ride SMART and SAFE, transforming the two-wheeler industry and touching the lives of millions. Ready to Start Your Adventure? If you're eager to be part of something transformative and a team that genuinely values your contributions, we want to hear from you. Send us your updated resume and a cover letter showcasing your enthusiasm for this role. Let your passion shine through, and let's embark on this incredible journey together. Then, this is the right place for you! Welcome to a host of exciting global opportunities within Accenture Strategy & Consulting's Customer, Sales & Service practice. The Practice A Brief Sketch Are you passionate about scaling businesses using in-depth frameworks and techniques to solve customer facing challenges? Do you want to design,  build  and implement strategies to enhance business performance? Does working in an inclusive and collaborative environment spark your interest? Then, this is the right place for you! Welcome to a host of exciting global opportunities within Accenture Strategy & Consulting's Customer, Sales & Service practice. The  practice is aligned to the  Global Network Song  Practice of Accenture and works with clients across their marketing,  sales  and services functions. As part of the team, you will provide transformation services driven by key offerings like Living Marketing, Connected Commerce and Next-Generation Customer Care. These services help our clients become living businesses by  optimizing  their marketing, sales, and customer service strategy, thereby driving cost reduction, revenue enhancement, customer satisfaction and  impacting  front end business metrics in a positive manner. You will work closely with our clients as consulting professionals who design,  build  and implement initiatives that can help enhance business performance. As part of the team, you will drive the following Develop digital marketing strategy/ campaigns: Study economic indicators, tracking changes in supply and demand, identifying customers and their current and future needs, and monitoring the competition.  Plan, design, and execute all web, SEO/SEM, database marketing material: Work on emails, social media, consumer marketing, BTL and display advertising campaigns.  Lead customer experience assessment,  marketing and advertising process and technology assessment, KPI and definition, solution and vendor assessment for different marketing technologies including Adobe  Designnew campaign strategies and strategize marketing plans :  Work across all channels and devices and design measurement and reporting framework to assess performance of all digital marketing campaigns against goals (ROI and KPIs).  Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience: Work across multiple channels and customer touch points, gathering business requirements, designing process & solution for implementation of marketing and advertising solutions  Work on Digital Marketing, Online Media Planning, Email Marketing, Affiliate Marketing: Deep-dive into Web Analytics, SEO, Social media marketing, CRM, Market Research, Marketing Analytics, PPC, Content marketing, Social analytics and ORM tools  Bring  your best  skills  forward  to e xcel at the role : Apply designing skills for new campaign strategies: Work on strategizing marketing plans across all channels and devices  Develop business cases for marketing use cases and solutions: Gather business requirements, designing process & solution for implementation of marketing and advertising solutions  Work with the Capability Network and the Market Unit leadership: Support business development and thought leadership in the campaign management and digital advertising space.  Experience in working  with middle to senior management levels within existing organization / client organizations  Client handling skills  to develop, manage and deepen relationships with key stakeholders  Team building skills  to collaborate, work and motivate teams with diverse skills and experience to achieve goals  Leadership skills  along with strong communication, problem solving, organizational and delegation skills to nurture and inspire team members Read about us Qualification Y our  experi ence counts! column2: Cadence Management is a boutique consultancy firm, and we work with companies across all stages providing an array of services, including recruitment support.  Cadence Management is hiring for one of its clients,  Param Life Wellness Private Limited . Param is founded by alumni of IIT/IIM and practitioners of positive psychology, yoga, and ayurveda, Param is a growing wellness brand, dedicated to enriching lives through our transformative holistic health & wellness programs. Our offline and online programs are for individuals as well as corporations, designed to boost their health, mental wellness, productivity, and overall happiness. Our programs are conducted across the country. We are looking for a like-minded, and passionate Digital Marketing champion to help expand our digital outreach so that we can inspire and impact more lives. Position:   Digital Marketing Manager Location:   Dehradun Note: The candidates who apply should be living in Dehradun. No. of Vacancy:   1 Experience:  4-6 years of proven experience in digital marketing, with expertise in content marketing, Meta, and Google ads. The Role Step into a role where your expertise in digital marketing can directly influence the well-being of thousands. As our Digital Marketing Manager, you'll spearhead our digital strategy, amplify our brand presence, and drive impactful engagement through innovative content marketing, SEO, and performance marketing campaigns such as Google Ads, and Meta Ads. This is your opportunity to blend creativity with technology to make a lasting impact in the lives of millions of people. If you are a digital marketing genius, buzzing with innovative and creative ideas with an equal dedication to flawless execution? And, are you passionate about channeling your creativity and expertise to enrich and transform lives across the globe? If your answers are yes and yes, this opportunity is for you -  Key Responsibilities Strategic Brand Growth:  Develop cutting-edge marketing campaigns that capture hearts and minds, and resonate with our core values. Performance Marketing Campaigns:  Manage and optimize Google Ads, Meta Ads, and other PPC platforms to generate leads and expand our customer base. Oversee the budgeting, execution, and performance of digital ads, ensuring alignment with our strategic goals. Innovative Content Leadership:  Oversee a rich content strategy that marries SEO savvy with engaging storytelling. Dynamic Social Media Engagement:  Cultivate our social media platforms into thriving communities of wellness enthusiasts. Expert SEO and SEM Execution:  Elevate our organic search rankings and masterfully manage pay-per-click campaigns to reach untapped audiences. Data-Driven Insights:  Harness analytics to refine marketing strategies and elevate campaign performance, ensuring data is at the heart of all decision-making. Collaborative Spirit:  Lead with inspiration, working alongside a passionate team to unify our digital efforts across multiple platforms. Required Skills and Attributes 4-6 years of proven experience in digital marketing, with expertise in content marketing, Meta, and Google ads. Strong understanding of SEO, social media, and content creation/marketing and proficiency in latest tools Creative and strategic thinker. Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English. A proven track record in crafting data-driven marketing strategies that produce tangible results. What We Offer: Free online yoga classes and ayurveda diet plans. Ongoing personal and professional development opportunities. Collaborative environment with supportive team members from IIT/IIM backgrounds. Educational Qualification:  Bachelors Degree in Marketing, Business  OR  Related Fields  OR  Relevant Work Experience. Compensation:  Competitive compensation (INR 6-9 lakh per annum, based on the fit & suitability). Ready to Apply? If you are confident of your inner marketing genius, ready to challenge yourself and grow further and passionate about making a real impact in the world, we look forward to hearing from you. Together, let's make this world a healthier and happier place! How to Apply? E-Mail:  aayushi@outlookwork.com  WhatsApp:  +91 6395 611 135

column2: Job Description: Digital Marketing Manager Location: Hyderabad Experience: Minimum 5 years in Digital Marketing Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced Digital Marketing Manager to develop, implement, track, and optimize our digital marketing campaigns across various digital channels. The ideal candidate will have a solid grasp of current marketing tools and strategies and be able to lead integrated digital marketing campaigns from concept to execution. Key Responsibilities: 1. Develop and Implement Digital Marketing Strategies: - Plan and execute comprehensive digital marketing campaigns to drive online traffic, leads, and conversions. - Develop and manage digital marketing budgets and ensure ROI targets are met. 2. Manage Digital Channels: - Oversee and manage all company websites, social media platforms, email marketing, and online advertising campaigns. - Monitor and analyze website analytics, PPC campaigns, and SEO/SEM strategies to optimize performance. 3. Content Creation and Management: - Coordinate with the content team to create engaging and SEO-friendly content for blogs, websites, and social media platforms. - Ensure brand consistency across all digital channels and campaigns. 4. Campaign Analysis and Reporting: - Track and analyze campaign performance metrics to measure ROI and identify areas for improvement. - Prepare and present regular performance reports to senior management.   5. Team Management and Development: - Lead and mentor the digital marketing team, fostering a collaborative and results-driven environment. - Stay updated with the latest digital marketing trends, technologies, and best practices to ensure the company remains at the forefront of the industry. Qualifications: - Bachelors degree in Marketing, Digital Technologies, or related field. - Minimum of 5 years of experience in digital marketing, with a proven track record of managing successful digital campaigns. - Strong understanding of digital marketing tools, platforms, and analytics. - Excellent communication, leadership, and organizational skills. - Creative thinker with a passion for digital marketing and a results-driven mindset. JD for Content writer: Job Description: Content Creator/Writer Experience: Minimum 3-5 years in Content Creation/Writing  Job Summary: We are seeking a skilled Content Creator/Writer to produce high-quality and engaging content across various platforms. The ideal candidate will have a strong writing portfolio, excellent grammar and proofreading skills, and a passion for storytelling. Key Responsibilities: 1. Content Creation: - Write and edit clear, concise, and grammatically correct content for websites, blogs, articles, social media, and other digital platforms. - Create compelling and engaging content that resonates with our target audience and drives engagement. 2. Content Strategy and Planning:   - Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content strategies that align with company goals and objectives. - Research industry-related topics to create informative and relevant content. 3. SEO Optimization: - Optimize content for SEO to improve search engine rankings and drive organic traffic. - Use keyword research tools to identify high-performing keywords and incorporate them into content. 4. Content Promotion: - Coordinate with the marketing team to promote content across various channels, including social media, email marketing, and PR campaigns. - Monitor content performance and make data-driven adjustments to optimize results. 5. Content Calendar Management: - Manage and maintain a content calendar to ensure consistent publishing schedules and deadlines are met. - Stay updated with industry trends and news to create timely and relevant content. Qualifications: - Bachelors degree in Journalism, English, Communications, or related field. - Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in content creation, copywriting, or journalism. - Exceptional writing, editing, and proofreading skills. - Strong understanding of SEO best practices and content marketing strategies. - Creative thinker with the ability to generate innovative ideas and concepts. Job Description: Social Media Manager / SEO Specialist / PPC Specialist Experience: Minimum 3-5 years in Social Media Management, SEO, or PPC Job Summary:   This role requires a multifaceted individual who can manage and optimize our social media presence, improve our website's search engine rankings, and oversee our PPC campaigns. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of digital marketing strategies and be able to implement effective tactics to drive engagement, traffic, and conversions. Key Responsibilities: Social Media Manager: 1. Develop, implement, and manage social media strategies across various platforms. 2. Create engaging content, including text, image, and video content. 3. Monitor and analyze social media performance metrics to optimize strategies. 4. Engage with followers and respond to comments, messages, and inquiries. 5. Collaborate with other teams to integrate social media with other marketing initiatives. SEO Specialist: 1. Optimize website content, meta tags, and on-page elements to improve search engine rankings. 2. Conduct keyword research to identify high-performing keywords and opportunities. 3. Monitor website analytics and performance to track SEO progress. 4. Implement link-building strategies to increase domain authority and backlinks. 5. Stay updated with SEO trends and algorithm changes to ensure compliance and effectiveness. PPC Specialist: 1. Develop and manage PPC campaigns across platforms like Google Ads, Bing Ads, etc. 2. Conduct keyword research and ad copy creation for PPC campaigns. 3. Monitor campaign performance and adjust bids to optimize ROI. 4. Analyze campaign data to identify trends, insights, and areas for improvement. 5. Collaborate with the marketing team to integrate PPC with overall marketing strategies. Qualifications: - Bachelor?? degree in Marketing, Digital Media, or related field. - Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in Social Media Management, SEO, or PPC. - Proven track record of managing successful campaigns and improving digital presence.   - Strong analytical, communication, and organizational skills. - Certifications in Google Ads, Google Analytics, or other relevant platforms are a plus. Job Description: Reputation Analyst Experience: Minimum 2-4 years in Reputation Management or Digital Marketing Job Summary: The Reputation Analyst will play a crucial role in assessing the company's online reputation, identifying potential issues, and implementing strategies to maintain and enhance our brand image. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, strong analytical skills, and a deep understanding of digital platforms and consumer behavior. Key Responsibilities: 1. Monitor Online Presence: - Conduct regular audits of online reviews, social media mentions, and other relevant platforms to assess the company's reputation. - Use monitoring tools to track brand mentions, sentiment, and engagement across the web. 2. Analyze Data and Insights: - Analyze data to identify trends, patterns, and insights related to the company's online reputation. - Provide actionable recommendations based on data-driven insights to improve reputation and mitigate risks. 3. Manage Online Reviews and Feedback: - Respond to customer reviews, comments, and inquiries in a timely and professional manner. - Coordinate with customer service and marketing teams to address and resolve customer concerns effectively. 4. Develop and Implement Reputation Strategies: - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and execute reputation management strategies. - Monitor the effectiveness of implemented strategies and make necessary adjustments to optimize results.   5. Stay Updated on Industry Trends: - Stay informed about industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in reputation management. - Share insights and updates with the team to ensure the company remains proactive in managing its online reputation. Qualifications: - Bachelor?? degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field. - Minimum of 2-4 years of experience in Reputation Management, Digital Marketing, or related roles. - Strong analytical, problem-solving, and critical thinking skills. - Excellent written and verbal communication skills. - Proficiency in using monitoring tools and analytics platforms. Job Description: Graphic Designer Experience: Minimum 2-5 years in Graphic Design Job Summary: We are looking for a creative individual with a passion for design to create visually appealing graphics and materials that effectively communicate our brand message. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio showcasing their design skills across various platforms and mediums. Key Responsibilities: 1. Graphic Design: - Create compelling visual designs for digital and print materials, including but not limited to websites, social media, advertisements, brochures, and presentations. - Develop illustrations, logos, and other branding materials that align with our brand identity and guidelines. 2. Collaboration and Teamwork: - Work closely with the marketing team to understand project requirements and objectives. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure designs meet project goals and deadlines.   3. Creative Conceptualization: - Brainstorm and conceptualize design ideas that effectively communicate our brand values and messaging. - Stay updated with design trends, techniques, and tools to continuously innovate and improve the quality of design output. 4. Quality Assurance: - Review and proofread designs for errors before finalizing them for production or publishing. - Ensure all design assets are consistent, high-quality, and adhere to brand guidelines. Qualifications: - Bachelor?? degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or related field. - Minimum of 2-5 years of experience in graphic design, with a strong portfolio showcasing diverse design projects. - Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign). - Strong understanding of typography, color theory, and layout principles. - Excellent communication, time management, and organizational skills. Job Description: Video Editor As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing and assembling recorded raw material into a finished product suitable for broadcasting or publication. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, strong technical skills, and a creative mindset. 1. Video Editining   - Edit raw footage to create compelling and visually appealing videos for various platforms, including social media, websites, and advertisements. - Use editing software (such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar) to enhance video quality, add effects, transitions, and sound. 2. Storyboarding and Scripting: - Collaborate with the creative team to develop storyboards and scripts for video projects. - Ensure that the final product aligns with the intended message and branding guidelines. 3. Color Grading and Audio Mixing: - Adjust colors, brightness, and contrast to achieve a consistent and professional look across all video content. - Mix and edit audio tracks, including dialogue, music, and sound effects, to enhance the overall viewing experience. 4. File Management and Organization: - Maintain an organized library of video assets, including raw footage, graphics, and audio files. - Ensure that project files are properly labeled, backed up, and easily accessible for future use. 5. Collaboration and Feedback: - Work closely with the creative team, including videographers, animators, and graphic designers, to bring video projects to life. - Incorporate feedback from stakeholders to refine and improve video content as needed. Qualifications: - Bachelor?? degree in Film Production, Video Editing, or related field (preferred). - Minimum of 2-5 years of experience in video editing, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work. - Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar. - Strong understanding of storytelling, pacing, and visual aesthetics. - Excellent communication and teamwork skills. Job Description: Web Developer/Designer   Experience: Minimum 3-5 years in Web Development and Design Job Summary: The Web Developer/Designer will be responsible for creating visually appealing and functional websites that align with our brand and business objectives. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both web development and design, with a passion for creating user-friendly and engaging digital experiences. 1. Web Development: - Develop and maintain responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other web technologies. - Implement and customize content management systems (CMS) such as WordPress, Joomla, or Drupal. - Optimize websites for speed, performance, and scalability. 2. Web Design: - Design and create visually compelling web pages, graphics, and UI elements that enhance user experience. - Collaborate with the marketing team to develop website layouts, navigation menus, and interactive features. - Ensure web designs are mobile-responsive and compatible across different browsers and devices. 3. SEO and Analytics: - Implement on-page SEO best practices to improve website visibility and search engine rankings. - Monitor website traffic, user engagement, and conversion rates using analytics tools like Google Analytics. - Optimize website content and structure based on data-driven insights. 4. Collaboration and Communication: - Work closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, content, and IT, to align website projects with company goals and objectives. - Communicate project status, timelines, and requirements effectively to stakeholders.   5.Continuous Learning and Innovation: - Stay updated with the latest web development and design trends, technologies, and best practices. - Recommend and implement new tools, plugins, or techniques to improve website functionality and user experience. Qualifications: - Bachelor?? degree in Web Development, Design, Computer Science, or related field. - Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in web development and design. - Proficiency in front-end and back-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL. - Experience with CMS platforms (WordPress, Joomla, Drupal) and web hosting environments. - Strong understanding of UI/UX design principles and responsive design techniques. column2: We are seeking an experienced and qualified candidate to join our Marketing team as a Digital Marketing Manager.      As a Digital Marketing Manager, you will be responsible to set up and manage the company's overall digital marketing strategies. You will play a vital role in accomplishing our business objectives and goals. You should have demonstrable experience of working with major technologies and marketing channels.      If your experience and skills match our criteria for the role of Digital Marketing Manager, apply for this job now. We will love to meet you      Responsibilities      Develop and implement all advanced digital marketing campaigns e.g. Pay-per-click (PPC)/Pay-Per-Performance (PPP), Search Engine Marketing (SEM)/Search Engine Optimization(SEO), Email Marketing, Send Marketing Messages (SMS) campaigns.          Build and maintain our social media presence.          Measure the overall ROI and KPIs of all digital marketing campaigns.          Identify current marketing trends and insights.          Optimize the costs and campaign performance based on these insights.          Develop creative digital marketing growth strategies.          Plan, execute and measure conversion tests to create strategic planning accordingly.          Work with internal teams to create landing pages and improve the consumer experience.          Use your analytical abilities to assess the experience of our audience over multiple channels.          Help in setting and optimizing marketing funnels (e.g, click funnel, conversion funnel, etc).      Requirements      Bachelor s degree in Marketing, Information Technology or related field.          Proven 2+years of experience in Digital Marketing Manager, Digital Marketing Specialist or a similar role in the Marketing Department.          Working knowledge of leading and managing SEO/SEM campaigns.          Certification of Advanced Digital Media Marketing will be preferred.          Ability to identify target audiences and devising effective campaigns.          Working experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels.          Familiar with website analytics tools like Crazy Egg, Mint, Matomo, etc.          Good knowledge of ad serving tools like Epom, DART, Aglare, Adzerk, etc.          Outstanding experience in setting up and optimizing Google Adwords campaigns.          Exceptional knowledge of content management and email marketing software.          Good understanding of social media and display advertising platforms.          Great interpersonal skills.          Exceptional oral and written communication skills.          Ability to work in a team or individually as and when required.          Ability to manage and handle multiple tasks.          Outstanding problem-solving skills.          Exceptional attention to detail.          Good time management abilities.          Strong decision-making skills.

column2: As a Conversion Rate Optimization Expert, you will be responsible for driving measurable improvements in our website s conversion rates and optimizing the user experience to enhance customer acquisition and engagement. You will play a pivotal role in maximizing our online revenue and ensuring that our digital marketing efforts are effective and efficient. We are looking for an innovative and data-driven individual who can identify opportunities, implement tests, and analyze results to optimize our conversion funnel.         Essential Duties and Responsibilities         Develop and execute a comprehensive conversion rate optimization (CRO) strategy to increase conversion rates across our website and landing pages.         Conduct in-depth analysis of user behavior, website performance, and conversion metrics to identify areas for improvement.         Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, design, development, and content, to implement CRO initiatives and improve user experience.         Utilize tools such as Google Analytics, heatmaps, A/B testing platforms, and user feedback to gather insights and generate hypotheses for testing.         Plan, implement, and manage A/B and multivariate tests to optimize various elements of the website, including layout, messaging, forms, calls-to-action, and pricing.         Analyze test results and user data to draw actionable insights and make data-driven recommendations to enhance conversion rates.         Identify and troubleshoot barriers to conversion, such as usability issues, technical glitches, or friction points in the customer journey.         Stay updated with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies related to CRO, and incorporate them into our optimization strategies.         Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to track key performance indicators (KPIs) and communicate progress and insights to stakeholders.         Collaborate with the marketing team to align CRO initiatives with overall marketing goals and campaigns.           Required Skill Set and Experience         Bachelor s degree in marketing, business, or a related field. A relevant master s degree is a plus.         Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and draw actionable insights.         Proficiency in using web analytics tools such as Google Analytics or similar platforms.         Familiarity with A/B testing platforms (e.g., Optimizely, VWO) and heatmapping tools (e.g., Hotjar, Crazy Egg).         Knowledge of UX/UI principles and best practices in web design and user experience.         Understanding of digital marketing channels and their impact on conversion rates.         Ability to think creatively, generate hypotheses, and conduct experiments to validate ideas.         Excellent communication skills with the ability to articulate complex concepts to non-technical stakeholders.         Detail-oriented mindset with a passion for delivering exceptional user experiences.

Monitor brand sentiment and customer satisfaction on social platforms and respond to inquiries and comments promptly. Collaboration skills with technical and non-technical teams. Ability to give attention to details and articulate thoughts/points effectively. An understanding of what works in a digital world and exceptional writing skills A passion for experimenting and generating new ideas for delivering content.

Analytics and Reporting:  Monitor digital marketing analytics and performance metrics, track campaign results, and provide regular reports to evaluate the effectiveness of our efforts. Community Engagement:  Engage with the online community, respond to comments and messages, and foster positive interactions with our audience. Website Management:  Maintain and update the organization's website, ensuring it remains user-friendly and up-to-date with current information. In addition, you will manage, guide and train digital marketers and other marketing positions within the team.     The successful candidate must have a strong passion for digital technologies and a proven track record of developing and implementing successful digital marketing campaigns. We are seeking an individual with excellent communication and interpersonal skills, who can collaborate effectively with team members and drive marketing initiatives forward.       Requirement:         3 years of experience as a Digital Marketing Executive.     2 years of experience in developing and implementing successful digital marketing strategies.     Good knowledge of all different digital marketing channels.     Good knowledge and experience with online marketing tools and best practices.     2 years of hands-on experience with SEO/SEM, Google Analytics and CRM software.     Familiarity with web design.     Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on a company s success.     Critical thinker and problem-solving skills.     Team player with excellent communication and interpersonal skills.     Good time-management skills.     BSc degree in Marketing, Digital technologies or a relevant field.         Responsibilities:         Develop, implement and manage the overall digital marketing strategy for the company.     Manage and guide the rest of the digital marketing team.     Stay up to date with the latest digital marketing trends and technologies.     Manage all digital marketing channels, including social media, email, display advertising, PPC and SEO. Oversee all social media accounts, ensuring they are aligned with the company s branding and messaging.     Manage and optimize online content, considering SEO and Google Analytics.     Build an inbound marketing plan.     Forecast sales performance trends.     Motivate the digital marketing team to achieve goals.     Monitor competition and provide suggestions for improvement.

column2: ?       As a Digital Marketing Manager, you will play a key role in developing our product positioning. You will help in developing our go-to-market strategy by working along with various teams including Product, Sales, Content, and Design.         You will be responsible for understanding the market landscape, identifying the Total Addressable Market (TAM), segmenting your target audience, and creating the strategic positioning, targeting plan, and channel mix to generate the organization s pipeline goals.         You will also be responsible for developing market competitive intelligence, value proposition sales enablement materials.         You will work closely with the marketing, product, and sales functions to build a robust launch and pipeline generation plan.         You will build execute the growth marketing strategy for our B2B solution, using a variety of channels.         You will lead SEO content strategy and operations for our B2B solution.         You will work closely with the product team to help determine the near- and long-term product roadmap.         Plan and execute all digital marketing, including web, SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaigns; Weigh-in, rationalize, and challenge the thinking to tightly align our digital marketing efforts with the business priorities.         You will set marketing KPIs and build campaign performance reports from time to time.         You will assist sales and business teams with lead generation, and industry fitments as well as through sales kits and various collaterals such as testimonials, case-studies to better the conversion funnel.         You will help us deepen our understanding of target market segments and relevant audiences through competitive and market intelligence.     REQUIREMENT RESPONSIBILITIES      Requirements:           Strong understanding of marketing roles in a professional services firm - marketing communications, campaigns, operations, and reporting.         Strong grasp of fundamentals of digital marketing knowledge in the areas including web, SEO/SEM, social media organic and paid.         6 8 years of experience in developing and executing impactful digital marketing strategies.         Ability to plan, analyze, and present data in intuitive graphical formats and interesting frameworks.         Experience with A/B and multivariate experiments.         SAAS based industry experience is an Advantage.         Experience in the AR and VR industry will be an advantage.         Can act and work as a digital expert/advisor with the leaders providing suggestions around strategy, planning, and impact reporting of various digital campaigns curated as per business priorities.         Solid knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends).         Experience in setting up and optimizing Google Adwords campaigns.         Expertise in MS Office skills, especially Excel and PowerPoint, and ability to integrate various technologies to support marketing efforts.         Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development and constraints.         Good understanding of digital and key social media platforms Twitter, LinkedIn, SlideShare, etc.         Big picture thinker with an ability to manage multiple and complex business priorities.         Ability to make connections in a highly matrixed environment, with an eye on integration.         Attention to detail with an ability to make critical decisions and develop plans to execute.         Persuasive communication skills with an ability to gain consensus.         Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement. column2: Barodian Advertising is seeking a highly motivated and enthusiastic Digital Marketing Intern to join our team. As a Digital Marketing Intern, you will have the opportunity to learn and work alongside our experienced digital marketing professionals to develop and implement digital marketing strategies for our clients. This is a paid internship that offers valuable training and practical experience in a fast-paced agency environment.      Responsibilities:        Assist in the development and implementation of digital marketing strategies for clients, under the guidance of the Digital Marketing Manager.          Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify target audiences, key trends, and opportunities for digital marketing campaigns.          Assist in planning, executing, and optimizing digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including social media, search engine optimization (SEO), pay-per-click (PPC) advertising, email marketing, and more.          Assist in creating engaging and relevant content for digital marketing campaigns, including ad copy, social media posts, blog articles, and email newsletters.          Support in monitoring and managing social media accounts, engaging with customers, and responding to inquiries and comments in a timely and professional manner.          Assist in analyzing website performance using web analytics tools and providing recommendations for improvement.          Collaborate with internal teams and external partners, such as graphic designers, developers, and vendors, to create and deliver digital marketing assets.          Stay up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends, best practices, and industry developments, and assist in making recommendations for incorporating new strategies and technologies into client campaigns.          Assist in measuring and reporting on the performance of digital marketing campaigns using key performance indicators (KPIs) and providing regular reports to the team.          Support in continuously monitoring and optimizing campaigns to improve performance, increase conversions, and achieve client goals.          Assist with other digital marketing tasks and projects as assigned. Strong interest in digital marketing and willingness to learn and grow in the field.          Basic understanding of digital marketing concepts, strategies, and best practices.          Familiarity with digital marketing tools and platforms, such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, Google Analytics, and email marketing software (experience is a plus but not required).          Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to create compelling content for various digital channels.          Strong organizational skills, with the ability to manage tasks and meet deadlines.          Creative mindset and ability to think critically and creatively to solve problems.          Self-motivated, proactive, and willing to take initiative.          Ability to work effectively in a team-oriented environment.

column2: ClearIAS is seeking a dynamic and experienced Digital Marketing Manager to lead our digital marketing initiatives. The Digital Marketing Manager will play a pivotal role in shaping our online presence, driving brand awareness, and expanding our reach to CSE aspirants through strategic digital marketing campaigns.     ClearIAS is an equal opportunity employer and encourages candidates from diverse backgrounds to apply.         Key Responsibilities:           Digital Marketing Strategy:    Develop and execute a comprehensive digital marketing strategy to achieve ClearIAS business objectives, including lead generation, user engagement, and revenue growth.       Campaign Management:    Plan, launch, and manage digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including PPC, SEO, email marketing, social media, content marketing, and affiliate marketing.       Team Leadership:    Manage and lead a team of digital marketing professionals, setting goals, monitoring performance, and fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment.       Budget Management:    Effectively allocate and manage the digital marketing budget, ensuring efficient spending and maximizing ROI.       SEO and SEM:    Oversee search engine optimization (SEO) efforts to improve organic search rankings and pay-per-click (PPC) campaigns to optimize ad spend and performance.       Content Strategy:    Collaborate with the content team to develop and execute content marketing strategies, ensuring high-quality, engaging content that aligns with digital marketing goals.       Analytics and Reporting:    Monitor and analyze the performance of digital marketing campaigns using tools like Google Analytics and provide insights and recommendations for optimization.       Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO):    Implement CRO strategies to improve website conversion rates and user experience.       Social Media Management:    Oversee social media marketing efforts to enhance brand visibility and engagement on platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn.       Affiliate and Partnership Programs:    Manage and expand affiliate marketing programs and partnerships to drive referrals and brand collaborations.       Stay Updated:    Keep abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and digital marketing best practices to ensure ClearIAS remains at the forefront of online education marketing.         Qualifications:         Bachelor s degree in marketing, business, or a related field (MBA preferred).     Proven experience as a digital marketing manager or in a similar role, with a track record of success in driving online growth.     Strong leadership and team management skills.     Proficiency in digital marketing tools, analytics, and platforms.     Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities.     Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.     Creative thinking and a passion for staying updated with digital marketing trends.     Previous experience in the education industry is a plus.

Client Management: Ability to build and maintain positive relationships with clients, understand their needs, and provide proactive support and guidance. Project Management: Strong organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment Problem-Solving: Resourcefulness and creativity in solving issues and challenges that arise during campaign setup, execution, and optimization Collaboration: Ability to work effectively as part of a cross-functional team, collaborating with sales, marketing, creative, and technical teams to deliver integrated advertising solutions. Adaptability: Flexibility and willingness to adapt to changing priorities, client requirements, and industry trends in the dynamic digital media landscape. Continuous Learning: Eagerness to stay updated on industry developments, new advertising technologies, and best practices through self-directed learning and professional development opportunities. Address client inquiries, resolve issues, and provide guidance on advertising solutions and best practices. Process Improvement and Optimization: Identify opportunities to streamline workflows, improve operational efficiency, and enhance service delivery. Our core objective? To craft a one-of-a-kind platform that reshapes the way the world approaches immigration, empowering individuals and families to embark on transformative journeys across borders. Situated in the bustling hub of Metro Vancouver, Acme Visa stands as a premier full-service Immigration Consulting Firm, dedicated to providing comprehensive immigration solutions. What sets us apart is our unwavering commitment to empowering people to move globally, transcending boundaries and unlocking new opportunities for personal and professional growth. At Acme Visa, we understand the profound impact that immigration can have on individuals and communities worldwide. That's why we've made it our mission to offer innovative solutions that streamline the immigration process, making it accessible and achievable for everyone, regardless of their background or circumstances. As a global immigration firm, Acme Visa serves clients from diverse cultural backgrounds and geographical locations. Our team of experienced consultants leverages their expertise and insights to navigate the complexities of immigration laws and regulations, ensuring seamless transitions for our clients as they embark on their global journeys. Whether you're seeking to reunite with loved ones, pursue educational opportunities abroad, or pursue career advancement in new territories, Acme Visa is here to support you every step of the way. We believe in empowering individuals to seize new opportunities, embrace cultural diversity, and build a brighter future for themselves and their families. Join us as we embark on a mission to empower the world through immigration. Welcome to Acme Visa, where borders are no barrier to ambition, and the world is yours to explore. Responsibilities : Design visually appealing and engaging graphics for various platforms including digital and print media, website, social media channels, email newsletters, presentations, advertisements, brochures, and other marketing collateral. Develop and maintain brand consistency across all design projects, ensuring adherence to brand guidelines and standards. Collaborate with the marketing team to conceptualize and execute creative campaigns that effectively communicate our immigration services and offerings. Create illustrations, infographics, icons, and other visual elements to support marketing initiatives and enhance content readability. Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in graphic design, incorporating innovative design techniques and technologies into our projects. Manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Work closely with internal stakeholders to understand project requirements, provide design recommendations, and incorporate feedback into final deliverables. Maintain organized files and documentation of design assets for easy access and future reference. Editing videos Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, Fine Arts, or a related field. Proven experience as a Graphic Designer or in a similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing creative and innovative design projects. Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign), Sketch, or similar tools. Solid understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and layout techniques. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively present ideas and receive feedback. Detail-oriented with a keen eye for aesthetics and visual consistency. Ability to work independently and as part of a team, prioritizing tasks and managing time efficiently. Experience in the immigration industry or working with multicultural audiences is a plus, but not required. Join our team and contribute your creativity and expertise to make a meaningful impact on the lives of individuals seeking immigration solutions. Apply now to be part of our mission-driven organization!

column2: Greeting from Black and White business solution !!!!   Role:  Ad Operations - Consultant. Experience:  1 -5 Years.  Location:  Bangalore.  Qualification  : Any Under graduate /Graduate  Role Overview:  We are seeking a highly motivated Media Operations Executive / Ad Operations Executive to join our team and provide exceptional support to our clients using Marketing , Talent & Learning Solutions.   Key Skills:  Advertising Platforms:  Proficiency in using advertising platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, LinkedIn Advertising, and others to manage campaigns and optimize performance.    Data Analysis:  Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret campaign data, identify trends, and draw actionable insights to optimize advertising strategies.   Technical Proficiency:  Familiarity with ad operations tools and technologies, including ad servers, tag management systems, and data management platforms.   Communication:  Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to effectively convey complex ideas and information to clients and internal stakeholders.   Client Management:  Ability to build and maintain positive relationships with clients, understand their needs, and provide proactive support and guidance.    Project Management:  Strong organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment Problem-Solving : Resourcefulness and creativity in solving issues and challenges that arise during campaign setup, execution, and optimization  Collaboration:  Ability to work effectively as part of a cross-functional team, collaborating with sales, marketing, creative, and technical teams to deliver integrated advertising solutions. Adaptability:  Flexibility and willingness to adapt to changing priorities, client requirements, and industry trends in the dynamic digital media landscape. Continuous Learning:  Eagerness to stay updated on industry developments, new advertising technologies, and best practices through self-directed learning and professional development opportunities.  Key Responsibilities: Client Support and Communication : Provide prompt and professional assistance to clients through various communication channels, including phone, email, and chat. Address client inquiries, resolve issues, and provide guidance on advertising solutions and best practices. Campaign Management:  Coordinate the setup, launch, and monitoring of advertising campaigns across different platforms. Ensure campaigns are executed accurately and in line with client objectives and specifications. Ad Operations Management:  Oversee ad operations processes, including ad trafficking, creative asset management, and quality assurance. Ensure timely and accurate delivery of advertising assets and campaigns.  Client Relationship Management:  Cultivate strong relationships with clients, serving as a trusted advisor and strategic partner. Proactively identify opportunities to optimize campaigns and drive client satisfaction and retention.   Cross-Functional Collaboration:  Collaborate closely with internal teams, including sales, marketing, and product development, to support client needs and drive business objectives. Provide feedback and insights to inform product enhancements and improvements.   Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution : Investigate and resolve technical issues, discrepancies, and other campaign-related challenges in a timely manner. Escalate complex issues to appropriate teams and stakeholders as needed.    Continuous Learning and Development : Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and platform updates related to digital advertising. Participate in training programs and skill development initiatives to enhance expertise and effectiveness in media operations.    Process Improvement and Optimization : Identify opportunities to streamline workflows, improve operational efficiency, and enhance service delivery. Implement best practices and standard operating procedures to drive consistency and excellence in media operations.   Quality Assurance and Compliance:  Ensure compliance with relevant policies, regulations, and industry standards related to advertising operations and data privacy. Conduct regular audits and checks to maintain quality standards and mitigate risks. This individual must love to work in an intense and exciting environment, thrive on challenging goals and be a great team player. You will collaborate with the Product, Growth, Sales, Engineering, and other strategic heads to develop programs and campaigns that drive demand. You will also develop and oversee implementation of proactive digital marketing strategy and campaigns to ensure accountability for results that meet or exceed organizational marketing objectives. Responsibilities:  Plan and execute all digital marketing activities, including but not limited to SEO/SEM, SMO/SMM, marketing database and email marketing campaigns  Plan and manage marketing automation, including lead scoring and nurturing to filter the right MQLs and SQLs eventually leading to a client conversion. column2: As a Digital Marketing Specialist at Acoem, you will have the critical task of creating a Digital Center of Excellence that is geared towards optimizing engagement excellence and empowering teams to achieve their objectives. This will require you to coordinate with Acoem s lead digital team in France and apply strategies globally, while assisting local teams with their digital initiatives to maximize sales impact.       Proactive approach and a sense of ownership       A sense of ownership over the company s website, as it is the centerpiece of the company s online presence. This requires taking responsibility for the website s performance, including:       Monthly performance analysis for Master + Countries website (with dedicated tools such as SEMRush)         Follow-up of Google analytics & error/alert management         Regular training, calls with countries with dashboard follow-up         Correction of pages wherever required in the web ecosystem         Analyzing performance metrics         Identifying areas for improvement.       You must be proactive in suggesting and implementing changes to the website to improve user experience, increase engagement, and drive conversions.       Proficiency in SEO tactics and strategies       You must have a thorough understanding of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and how it can be applied to enhance digital marketing initiatives. This includes being familiar with:         Keyword research           On-page and off-page optimization, link building         Content strategy, among other things         Conducting technical SEO audits to identify and fix issues         Undertaking competitive analysis to identify opportunities.         Sharp marketing instincts       Must have a strong understanding of digital marketing tools such as social media marketing, email marketing, content marketing, and pay-per-click (PPC) advertising. Analyze campaign performance data, generate reports, and provide insights to improve campaign performance.       An ability to think big-picture       Should have a broad perspective on the company s overall goals and how digital marketing can help achieve them. This requires the ability to think beyond short-term tactics and focus on long-term strategy.       Top-notch communication skills and a collaborative spirit       Able to work effectively with other teams, such as sales, graphic, web development, analytics, IT, marketing, and more, to ensure that all digital marketing initiatives are integrated and aligned. Additionally, you must be able to effectively communicate progress, results, and recommendations to stakeholders and other members of the organization.       Curiosity and adaptability       The digital marketing landscape is constantly evolving, so as a Digital Marketing Specialist, you must be curious and adaptable to new trends and technologies. This requires a willingness to learn and experiment with new tactics and strategies. By staying up-to-date with the latest trends and tools. Part of your job is to constantly review its content to see if it aligns with ever-changing SEO best practices.         Desired Skills And Experience         Proven records of SEO strategies implementation from content and technical point of view         Understanding of search engine algorithms and ranking factor         Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms, including Google Analytics, Search Console, AdWords, SEMrush, Ahrefs or equivalent and social media management platforms         Familiarity with WordPress         Proven records of SEA campaigns from creation to optimization         Relevant certifications such as Google AdWords, Analytics or SEO certifications is a plus         Experience with data analysis and reporting using tools such as Excel, Tableau, or Google Data Studio is a plus         Ability to work independently and as part of a team to achieve common goals.         Qualifications:         Bachelor s degree in Mass Communication/Marketing, or a related field.         3-5 years of professional experience in a similar position.       If you like challenging, dynamic and international environments, join us!
