column2: Role & responsibilities   The  Customer Data Platform (CDP) Specialist  is responsible for the execution and management of audiences and journeys built in CDP. This role fully supports the Digital Marketing efforts to grow and engage the customer base. The CDP specialist will have experience understanding marketing requirements, analyzing customer data to make audience recommendations and building experiences within a CDP. are currently seeking an individual who can promptly join our team or currently serving notice period.  Business Partnership:  Support requirement capture workshops with marketing stakeholders for Omni-channel customer engagement strategy. Support inbound audience requests from business stakeholders. Audience Management & Activation:  Build campaign audiences in CDP, set up audience journeys, review with stakeholders and activate the audiences across marketing channels. Data Governance & Hygiene:  Support Data Quality efforts, including the collection and maintenance of complete, consistent and compliant data. Execute data validation, and perform UAT on new builds Build to scale:  Partner with IT & Ops to build new integration endpoints with clearly articulated User Stories, roadmap and implementation plans. Build proofs-of-concept (POC)forpotential new solutionsandtechnologies by partnering with technology teams. Preferred candidate profile    You should be creative and analytical with large data sets from multiple data sources. You thrive in a fast-paced environment, yet remain grounded to ensure compliance, standards and goals are met. You should have strong verbal, written and communication skills. You work well with marketing and technology teams on a daily basis.    Intermediate Proficiency in SQL/Query languages, is must 2+ years of experience in B2B Marketing campaign, marketing analytics & data strategy Hands-on experience with a CDP (ActionIQ/Salesforce/Adobe etc) is a plus Strong technology, analytics and organizational skills. Technical understanding of Marketing Automation tools (Marketo/SFMC etc), Salesforce CRM, Advertising platforms (e.g. Google Ads, Facebook) is desirable. Produce high quality and quantity of work product, occasionally under tight timelines. A passion for metrics. You live for the data. Perks and benefits

column2: Job Description :  Digital Marketing Executive (Junior & Senior)  for Herbal Manufacturing Product Company Location: Kandivali,  Mumbai (Only applications from nearby locations will be considered) We are a leading manufacturer of herbal products, dedicated to promoting natural health and wellness. Our product range includes herbal supplements, skincare, and personal care products, all made from high-quality natural ingredients. We are looking for passionate and creative individuals to join our team in Mumbai as Digital Marketing Executives at both junior and senior levels. Position: Junior Digital Marketing Executive No. Of Vacancies : 2 Key Responsibilities: 1. Content Creation and Management: Assist in creating, curating, and managing content across digital platforms including website, social media, email campaigns, and blogs. Support the creation of visually appealing graphics and videos. 2. SEO/SEM Support: Assist in optimizing website content for search engines (SEO) to increase organic traffic. Support the management and optimization of PPC campaigns. 3. Social Media Engagement: Help develop and manage social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement. Monitor social media channels and engage with followers. 4. Email Marketing: Assist in the design and execution of email marketing campaigns. Analyze campaign performance and suggest improvements. 5. Analytics and Reporting: Track and report website traffic flow and performance of digital marketing campaigns. Provide regular updates and reports to the senior team. Requirements: Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business, or Any Graduate. Freshers to 3 yrs of experience in digital marketing or a related field. Basic understanding of SEO, SEM, and social media marketing. Position: Senior Digital Marketing Executive No. Of Vacancies : 1 Key Responsibilities: 1. Digital Strategy and Planning: Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies to achieve business goals. Conduct market research to identify trends and insights for optimizing spend and performance. 2. Content Creation and Management: Lead the creation, curation, and management of content across all digital platforms. Collaborate with designers to create visually appealing graphics and videos. 3. SEO/SEM Management: Optimize website and content for search engines (SEO) to increase organic traffic. Manage and optimize PPC campaigns on Google AdWords, Facebook, Instagram and other search engines. 4. Social Media Marketing: Develop and manage social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement. Monitor, listen, and respond to users in a Social way while cultivating leads and sales. 5. Email Marketing: Design and execute email marketing campaigns to nurture leads and engage customers. Analyze campaign performance and implement improvements. 6. Analytics and Reporting: Track and analyze website traffic flow and provide regular internal reports. Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs). 7. Partnerships and Collaborations: Identify and negotiate with influencers, bloggers, and partners to promote our products. Manage affiliate marketing programs. 8. Customer Engagement: Engage with customers online to build brand loyalty and address customer queries and concerns. Requirements: - Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business, or Any Graduate. -3+ years of experience in digital marketing, preferably within the FMCG or herbal products industry. Proven experience in developing and managing digital marketing campaigns. - Solid understanding of SEO, SEM, and social media marketing. Benefits:  Competitive salary, Leaves, Bonus & Mediclaim. A supportive and collaborative work environment. Company Website :  https://www.herbalhillswellness.com   If you are interested then please send your resume on email hr@herbalhills.in  Contact Number - 8291967915

column2: The SEO Intern role offers a valuable opportunity for individuals interested in gaining hands-on experience in the field of search engine optimization (SEO). The SEO Intern will play a supportive role in optimizing online presence, enhancing search engine rankings, and acquiring practical skills in digital marketing.   Job Role & responsibility:      Keyword Research Support:     Assist in conducting keyword research to identify relevant keywords and phrases for SEO campaigns.      Learn to analyze keyword trends, search volumes, and competition.     On-Page Optimization Assistance:     Support the implementation of on-page SEO strategies, such as optimizing meta tags, headings, and content.      Learn basic on-page optimization techniques.     Content Optimization Support:     Collaborate with content teams to optimize existing content for SEO purposes.     Gain exposure to aligning content with target keywords and user intent.     Basic Technical SEO Tasks:     Assist in basic technical audits to identify potential website issues affecting SEO performance.     Learn about site structure, internal linking, and navigation improvements.     Link Building and Outreach Support:     Support link-building efforts through outreach, partnerships, and content promotion. Learn about basic backlink acquisition techniques.      Analytics and Reporting:     Assist in monitoring website performance using SEO tools and platforms.     Learn to create basic reports on key metrics and data analysis.     Learning and Development:     Participate in training sessions, workshops, and learning opportunities provided by the SEO team.     Gain exposure to search engine algorithm updates and industry trends.

column2: Position Overview:  We are seeking a dynamic and creative Digital Marketing and Content Creation Executive to join our team. This role involves managing our social media presence, executing digital marketing campaigns, and creating engaging video content for our LED van rental services. The ideal candidate will have a passion for digital marketing, a knack for video production and editing, and the ability to drive brand awareness and engagement through innovative content strategies. Key Responsibilities: Digital Marketing: Develop and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and drive engagement. Manage and optimize all social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.) to grow followers and increase engagement. Monitor and analyze social media trends, tools, and applications, and apply that knowledge to enhance the company's social media presence. Plan and execute paid social media and Google Ad campaigns to reach target audiences and achieve business objectives. Content Creation: Create, shoot, and edit high-quality video content and reels using mobile devices, tailored for various social media platforms. Develop creative concepts and scripts for video content that highlights our LED van rental services. Ensure all content aligns with the brand voice and marketing goals. Stay updated with the latest trends in video content and digital marketing to keep our strategies fresh and effective. Analytics and Reporting: Track and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) for digital marketing campaigns and social media activities. Analyze data to gain insights and adjust strategies to improve performance and reach. Provide regular updates and reports to management on campaign effectiveness and ROI. Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing team to ensure cohesive branding and messaging across all channels. Collaborate with the sales team to create promotional materials and campaigns that support sales initiatives. Coordinate with external vendors and partners as needed for campaign execution. Preferred Skills: Experience in the events or rental services industry. Knowledge of graphic design tools (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Canva). Basic understanding of SEO and content marketing principles. Working Conditions: This is a Semi Office & field-based role. Flexibility to work during evenings or weekends for content creation during events. If you are passionate about digital marketing, love creating engaging video content, and want to be part of a dynamic team in the LED van rental industry, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and help us drive our brand forward through innovative digital strategies and compelling content.

column2: Skill required:Digital Marketing and Campaigns - Digital Marketing  Designation:Management Level - Analyst  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:3 to 5 years  What would you do? Be a part of the Marketing Operations team that is leading the managed services arm of Accenture. We power our client's business through the integration of insights, data, and technology. We are focused on activating and scaling the best brand experiences, to deliver breakthrough marketing-led growth, cost-effectively, across all digital consumer touchpoints and channels. The value we bring to clients boosts their marketing efficiency and effectiveness that powers their growth. We're looking to hire passionate and innovative leaders in Marketing Operations with deep domain expertise in digital marketing and delivering cutting edge marketing services across a range of clients and industries, bringing with them strong operations acumen and transformative leadership. You will be working as a part of the Digital Marketing & Campaign team which helps clients with their digital campaign & digital marketing requirements. They help provide various services around list pull, list hygiene & lead uploads, providing data-driven insights to clients, and help them get better ROI from their various digital marketing initiatives. The team is primarily accountable for performing list pull from Client Database by writing complex SQL queries. They also leverage popular tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Workfront Work Management Software, Atlassian Jira, etc. A generic term for the marketing of products or services using digital technologies, mainly on the Internet, but also including mobile phones, display advertising, and any other digital medium.  What are we looking for? Ability to perform under pressure  Problem-solving skills  Agility for quick learning  Results orientation  Detail orientation Roles and Responsibilities:  In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of lower-complexity problems  Your day to day interaction is with peers within Accenture before updating supervisors  In this role you may have limited exposure with clients and/or Accenture management  You will be given moderate level instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instructions on new assignments  The decisions you make impact your own work and may impact the work of others  You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a focused scope of work  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

Be a part of the Marketing Operations team that is leading the managed services arm of Accenture. We power our client's business through the integration of insights, data, and technology. The team also leverages popular tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Workfront Work Management Software, HTML, Javascript, Atlassian Jira, etc. You will be responsible for working primarily on HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) which is a set of markup symbols or codes inserted in a file intended for display on a World Wide Web browser page. It describes the structure of text-based information in a document by denoting certain text as links, headings, paragraphs and lists as well as to supplement that text with interactive forms, embedded images and other objects--typically for developing web pages.  What are we looking for? Hyper Text Markup Language (HTML)  Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)  JavaScript  JQuery  Ability to work well in a team  Ability to handle disputes  Ability to establish strong client relationship  Agility for quick learning  Ability to meet deadlines Roles and Responsibilities  In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines  Your expected interactions are within your own team and direct supervisor  You will be provided detailed to moderate level of instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instruction on new assignments  The decisions that you make would impact your own work  You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a predetermined, focused scope of work  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

column2: Overview:  We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Digital Marketing Manager specializing in consumer marketing to lead our digital efforts targeting consumers. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of consumer behavior, digital channels, and marketing strategies to effectively engage and convert our target audience. They will be responsible for developing and implementing digital campaigns that drive brand awareness, customer acquisition, and retention.  **** Candidates from FMCG background or working for FMCG clients are only preferred. (Mandatory)**** Responsibilities: 1) Consumer Insights: Analyze consumer behavior to identify key insights and trends. Use consumer data to develop targeted marketing strategies and personalized campaigns. Stay updated on industry trends and competitor activities to inform marketing decisions. 2) Digital Campaign Management: Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns across various channels including social media, email, search, and display advertising. Collaborate with internal teams and external agencies to create compelling campaign content and messaging. Monitor campaign performance, optimize tactics, and track KPIs to ensure campaign success. 3) SEO (Search Engine Optimization): Implement SEO strategies to improve organic search visibility and drive website traffic. Conduct keyword research, on-page optimization, and technical SEO audits to enhance website performance. Monitor search engine algorithms and industry updates to stay ahead of SEO trends and best practices. 4) SEM (Search Engine Marketing): Plan and execute SEM campaigns using platforms such as Google Ads and Bing Ads to drive targeted traffic and conversions. Conduct keyword research, ad copy optimization, and bid management to maximize ROI. Optimize SEM campaigns based on performance metrics and market trends. 5) Social Media Management: Manage and grow the company's presence on social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn). Develop and implement social media strategies to engage consumers, drive brand awareness, and foster community engagement. Create and curate engaging content (e.g., posts, videos, stories) that resonates with the target audience. 6) Email Marketing: Plan and execute email marketing campaigns to nurture leads, drive conversions, and increase customer loyalty. Segment email lists based on consumer demographics, behaviors, and preferences. Optimize email campaigns for deliverability, open rates, click-through rates, and conversions. 7) Content Creation: Develop high-quality content (e.g., blog posts, articles, videos, infographics) that educates, entertains, and engages consumers. Collaborate with content creators, designers, and videographers to produce visually appealing and shareable content. Ensure content is aligned with brand voice, messaging, and marketing objectives. 8)Performance Analysis and Reporting: Monitor digital marketing metrics and KPIs to evaluate campaign performance and ROI. Analyze data to identify trends, insights, and areas for optimization. Prepare regular reports and presentations to communicate findings and recommendations to key stakeholders. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field (Master's degree preferred). Minimum 3 years of experience in digital marketing with a focus on consumer marketing. Proven track record of developing and executing successful digital marketing campaigns. Strong understanding of digital channels, including social media, email, search, and display advertising. Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms such as Google Analytics, Facebook Business Manager, Mailchimp, etc. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data, generate insights, and make data-driven decisions. Creative thinker with a passion for storytelling and engaging consumers. Completion of a recognized digital marketing course is considered a strong value-add.  Interested candidates can share their profiles to raksha@proklean.in

You will play a major role in enhancing brand awareness within the digital space as well as driving website traffic and acquiring leads/customers. The ideal candidate should have hands-on experience with various digital marketing tools and techniques and a passion for staying updated with industry trends. Key Responsibilities:   Campaign Management: Develop, implement, and manage digital       marketing campaigns across multiple channels (Google Ads, social media,       email marketing, etc.). Monitor and analyze campaign performance and       make data-driven decisions to optimize results. Content Creation: Write and produce high-quality content for       blogs, websites, social media, and other digital platforms. Collaborate with the design team to create       engaging multimedia content. Search Engine Optimization (SEO): Perform ongoing keyword research and       optimization for SEO. Analyze website analytics to identify       opportunities for improvement. Implement on-page and off-page SEO strategies       to increase organic search visibility and rankings. Search Engine Marketing (SEM): Plan, execute, and manage paid search       campaigns (PPC) on platforms like Google Ads. Conduct A/B testing and optimize ad copy,       landing pages, and bids to improve ROI. Social Media Optimization (SMO): Develop and implement social media strategies       to increase brand awareness and engagement. Manage and grow social media accounts by       creating and sharing relevant content. Google Analytics: Set up and manage Google Analytics accounts. Track, analyze, and report on key metrics to       understand user behavior and campaign effectiveness. Provide actionable insights and       recommendations based on data analysis. Proficient in using digital marketing tools      such as Google Ads, Google Analytics, SEO tools (e.g., SEMrush, Moz), and      social media management platforms. Strong understanding of SEO, SEM, SMO, and      content marketing principles. Excellent written and verbal communication      skills. Analytical mindset with the ability to      interpret data and make informed decisions. Creative thinker with a keen eye for detail. Preferred Skills: Experience with email marketing platforms      (e.g., Brevo, HubSpot). Familiarity with HTML/CSS and basic web      development. column2: Job Title: Digital Marketing Manager Department: Marketing Location: Madhapur Job Type: Permanent & Full-Time Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 10:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m. Job Brief: We are seeking a skilled and results-driven Digital Marketing Manager to join our Marketing team. As a Digital Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for developing and executing comprehensive digital marketing strategies to drive brand awareness, customer acquisition, and revenue growth. You will leverage various digital channels and tools to create engaging campaigns, optimize online presence, and analyze campaign performance. Responsibilities and Duties: Develop and implement digital marketing strategies across various channels, including search engine marketing (SEM), search engine optimization (SEO), social media, email marketing, content marketing, and display advertising. Create and manage digital marketing campaigns, including campaign planning, execution, optimization, and reporting. Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify trends, insights, and opportunities for campaign optimization. Collaborate with internal teams to develop compelling and persuasive digital content, such as website copy, blog posts, social media posts, and email newsletters. Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the effectiveness of digital marketing campaigns and make data-driven recommendations for improvement. Stay up to date with the latest digital marketing trends, tools, and best practices, and provide insights and recommendations for incorporating new strategies. Manage relationships with external digital marketing agencies and vendors, ensuring deliverables meet quality standards and objectives. Oversee website analytics, tracking, and reporting, and provide regular reports on campaign performance to stakeholders. Collaborate with the design team to create visually appealing and user-friendly digital assets, including banners, landing pages, and email templates. Optimize website content and structure to improve organic search rankings and enhance user experience. Ensure compliance with relevant legal and privacy regulations, such as GDPR and CCPA, in all digital marketing activities. Required Qualifications and Skills: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Advertising, Business, or a related field. Proven experience in digital marketing, with a focus on developing and implementing successful digital marketing strategies. In-depth knowledge of various digital marketing channels, platforms, and tools. Strong understanding of SEO, SEM, social media marketing, email marketing, content marketing, and display advertising. Proficiency in web analytics tools, such as Google Analytics, to track and report on campaign performance. Experience with marketing automation tools and CRM systems. Analytical mindset and ability to derive insights from data to optimize campaign performance. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Strong project management and organizational abilities. Creative thinking and problem-solving skills. Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. Application Instructions:  To apply, please send your resume to talentacquisition@myverkoper.com or visit our Careers page at https://careers.myverkoper.com.

column2: Position Title: Business Development Manager Job Description: We are seeking an experienced and results-driven Business Development Manager to join our dynamic team. The successful candidate will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building and maintaining client relationships, and achieving sales targets. Key Responsibilities: Identify and prospect potential clients through cold calling, networking, and other lead-generation activities. Develop and maintain strong relationships with existing clients to maximize repeat business and referrals. Conduct thorough market research to identify trends, competitor activities, and potential growth opportunities. Collaborate with internal teams to develop tailored solutions and proposals that meet client needs and objectives. Present sales proposals and negotiate contracts with prospective clients. Track and report sales metrics and KPIs, and provide regular updates to management. Stay up-to-date on industry trends, market conditions, and best practices in business development and sales. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field. Proven track record of success in business development and sales, with at least 3+ years of experience in a similar role. Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Excellent networking and relationship-building abilities. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite and CRM software. Previous experience in [specific industry or sector] is a plus. This is an exciting opportunity for a motivated and ambitious individual to make a significant impact and drive business growth. If you have a passion for sales and a desire to excel in a dynamic environment, we want to hear from you! Apply now to join our team as a Business Development/Sales Executive.   Strong understanding of the billing software industry, market dynamics, and customer needs. Proven experience in sales, with a focus on selling billing software solutions.

column2: About us : Established in 1992, Hari Krishna Exports Pvt. Ltd. has earned a distinguished global reputation as a trusted diamond supplier. At the heart of our operations lies a commitment to ethical practices, environmental responsibility, and community engagement.  Our presence spans across 86 countries, reflecting our global influence and commitment to excellence.  At Hari Krishna Exports Pvt. Ltd., we believe that diamonds symbolize more than everlasting love; they are a testament to our dedication to sustainability, innovation, and community empowerment.  Role & responsibilities  :   We are seeking an experienced and result-driven SEO Specialist to join our dynamic marketing team. As an SEO Specialist, you will be responsible for developing and implementing effective search engine optimization (SEO) strategies to increase our website's organic traffic and improve search engine rankings. Keyword Research and Strategy:  Conduct thorough keyword research and analysis to identify opportunities for content optimization and new content creation. Develop and implement SEO strategies aligned with business objectives. On-Page Optimization: Optimize website content, meta tags, headings, and internal linking structure. Ensure web pages are search-engine friendly, adhering to best practices for on-page SEO. Content Development: Collaborate with content creators to ensure content is optimized for SEO. Provide recommendations and execute strategies for content development in coordination with SEO goals. Technical SEO: Conduct technical audits to identify and resolve issues affecting search engine crawlability and indexation. Optimize site architecture, URL structures, and navigation to enhance SEO. Link Building: Develop and execute effective link-building strategies to improve domain authority. Manage relationships with external partners for backlinks. Performance Monitoring and Reporting: Monitor website performance using SEO tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Ahrefs). Provide regular reports on SEO performance and insights to stakeholders. Competitor Analysis: Conduct competitive analysis to identify strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats in the SEO landscape. Stay updated with industry trends and algorithm changes to ensure compliance with search engine guidelines. Preferred candidate profile  : Minimum of 2-3 years of experience in SEO. Proven track record of successful SEO campaigns and improved organic search performance. Skills and Competencies: Strong understanding of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and SEO best practices. Proficiency with SEO tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Ahrefs, Moz, etc. Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and website administration. Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Perks and benefits   Best in the industry
column11: Online Marketing, Digital Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Marketing, Google Ads, Google Marketing, Facebook Ads, Internet Marketing, Campaign Management, Facebook Marketing, Performance Marketing

column2: WHAT DO WE OFFER Here is an exciting role for dynamic go-getters to explore a career in Digital Marketing with the largest, fastest growing and the most sustainable wine company and alcobev business in India.  This role will be based out of our office in Andheri (East), Mumbai & will be a great opportunity to demonstrate your excellence at driving results while working directly with a seasoned team at Sula.    WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR We are seeking a talented Digital Marketing Manager who will be responsible for supporting end-to-end digital marketing initiatives, campaign management, and demonstrating excellent collaboration and time-management skills. This role will be responsible for but not limited to the following: 1. Digital Marketing: Content Creation: Develop and manage engaging and high-quality content across various digital platforms including website, blog, email newsletters, and social media channels.  Collaborate with the design team to create visually appealing graphics, videos, and infographics that align with Sulas brand identity.  Social Media Management: Plan and execute social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement on platforms such as Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.  Monitor social media trends, respond to customer inquiries, and manage online reputation.  Performance Marketing: Manage and optimize digital advertising campaigns (Google Ads, Facebook Ads, etc.) to drive traffic, engagement, and conversions.  Analyze and report on the performance of digital marketing campaigns, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.  Influencer Marketing: Identify and collaborate with relevant influencers and brand ambassadors to enhance brand visibility and credibility.  Manage relationships with influencers, ensuring alignment with Sulas brand values and marketing objectives.    2. Marketing Operations: Budgeting:   Assist in the preparation of the marketing budget and monitor expenses to ensure cost-effectiveness and adherence to budgetary constraints.  Track and report on budget performance, providing recommendations for adjustments, as necessary.    MUST HAVE REQUIREMENTS  Bachelors/Masters Degree, preferably in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or a related field. 3-5 years of proven experience in digital marketing roles, demonstrating the ability to manage campaigns and deliver results. Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively convey ideas and collaborate with cross-functional team members and stakeholders. Excellent organizational and time management skills with a keen eye for detail Ability to quickly adapt to new tools, platforms, and changes in the digital landscape. Awareness of current trends and best practices in digital marketing & understanding of brand development and brand positioning strategies.   We offer a competitive salary, comprehensive benefits, and a dynamic work environment where you can thrive and grow as a professional. If you meet the above requirements and are passionate about Digital Marketing, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity!
column11: Digital Marketing, Content Creation, Marketing Operations, Digital Campaigns, Campaign Management, Social Media Marketing, Budgeting, Brand Awareness, Influencer Marketing, Performance Marketing

Job Description                   We are looking for an enthusiastic Digital Marketing Intern with a "can-do" attitude to assist our organization to manage and oversee all aspects of a digital marketing campaign to effectively promote the brand s product(s). The Digital Marketing Intern will handle marketing campaigns, monitor and evaluate online media campaigns, stay within budget stay current with emerging opportunities in the digital marketing world. Your creativity, marketing skills, and vision will assist our organization in amplifying brand visibility, enhancing its digital presence, and improving our organizations growth through digital marketing. Knowledge of leading and managing SEO/SEM campaigns.               Ability to identify target audiences and devise effective campaigns.               Familiar with website analytics tools.               Knowledge of content management and email marketing software.               Good understanding of social media and display advertising platforms.               Great interpersonal skills. Thrive in matrix environments and adept at building relationships with different stakeholders.

column1: Director Digital Marketing & Inside Sales (IT Services)
column2: Preferred candidates with consulting/IT backgrounds and would welcome Hubspot skills also. Important points:  Fantastic English language, able to converse with customers as first touch point (managing sales line)  US working hours or as close to US work hours as possible, eg: 6hr overlap approx. min.  Working knowledge of our systems, such as call rail, hub spot, WordPress, zoom info and others.  Management responsibility for 1-2 team members initially. Candidates should be interested in working as individual contributor role. Duties and Responsibilities: Demand Generation Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, drive traffic to our website, and acquire new customers. Should exhibit fluent/ verbal communication skills which will be required when answering inbound sales calls for qualification and nurturing leads  Plan, create, and optimize digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including but not limited to, social media, email marketing, search engine optimization (SEO), search engine marketing (SEM), content marketing, and display advertising. Create and run email campaigns to targeted accounts via Hubspot email campaign engine Build and manage marketing automation workflows and lead nurturing programs to engage prospects throughout the buyer's journey and drive them towards conversion. Web & Analytics Proactively monitor performance and engagement across the corporate website and web assets.  Implement goals and conversion tracking using systems like Google Analytics 4 and Google Tag Manager. Leverage HubSpot for setting up and managing web assets, user activity, and reporting. Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Implement on-page and off-page SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings for targeted keywords and markets. Proactively conduct SEO audits and marketing research for optimization opportunities. Collaborate with content and sales teams to build SEO-friendly content assets. Pay-Per-Click (PPC) Advertising Set up and manage Google Ads and LinkedIn Ads marketing campaigns. Conduct keyword research and analysis for effective targeting and optimal impact.  Work with internal teams to build compelling ads and effective workflows. Continuously monitor PPC campaign performance and adjust strategies for maximum ROI.  Website & CMS Manage content and functional updates for the corporate website and WordPress CMS backend. Manage content, assets and workflows on HubSpot CRM.  Collaborate with the web and design teams, and agency partners to ensure seamless functioning and updates to the website.  Collaboration Work closely with marketing and organizational leadership for setting goals and program expectations. Regularly collaborate with internal teams and agency partners for planning, implementation, and reporting.  Support cross-functional projects, as required. Measurement & Reporting Adopt a data-driven approach to collate data from multiple sources and proactively analyze web, SEO & PPC performance.  As required, liaise with web, social and sales teams, as well as agency partners to analyze the broader asset/campaign performance and user engagement. Regularly report on ROI of analytics, SEO & PPC against standard KPIs, along with critical business insights and recommendations for improvement.  Qualifications Education and Years of Experience:   Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field Minimum of 10-15 years of experience in digital marketing with proven performance (Exceptional candidates with less experience will be considered). Desirable: Certifications in web technologies, digital marketing platforms, and marketing and communications.  Required and Desired Skills: Excellent communication skills; both written and verbal Proficiency in web and marketing analytics tools like Google Analytics 4, Google Tag Manager, and HubSpot. Demonstrable experience in digital marketing tactics like SEO (on-page and off-page), content marketing, etc.  Strong experience in driving paid search and paid social campaigns (Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, etc.) with demonstrated ROI. Working knowledge of managing CMS platforms like WordPress. Excellent analytical skills with a data-driven mindset; ability to think out of the box and come up with creative solutions for day-to-day problems.  Familiarity with sales intelligence tools like ZoomInfo, Sales Navigator, and CallRail is an advantage. Experience with social media marketing and email marketing is desirable. Knowledge of multimedia and web technologies (Adobe Creative Cloud, HTML/CSS, etc.) is a plus.  Strong communication and collaboration skills with attention to detail. Ability to adapt to a fast-paced, dynamic work environment, with the agility to contribute individually as well as a team player simultaneously. The passion to constantly upskill and staying updated with trends and best practices within the technology markets.  Additional Requirements: A candidate located in and around Pune city is preferable to comply with a hybrid work schedule.

column2: *IMMEDIATE JOINING* Job Location: Meerut  Responsibilities:   Digital Marketing Strategy:  Develop and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies to promote our real estate projects across various online platforms.   Campaign Management:  Design, execute, and manage multi-channel marketing campaigns (digital, print, events, partnerships) to generate high-quality leads.   Social Media Marketing:  Create and manage content for Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and other social media platforms. Develop strategies to increase engagement and grow our social media presence.   Graphic Design:  Create visually appealing graphics for social media, websites, advertisements, and other marketing materials.   Video Editing:  Produce and edit videos for promotional purposes, including property tours, client testimonials, and brand stories.   SEO & Website Management:  Optimize website content for search engines to improve organic search rankings. Manage website updates and ensure a seamless user experience.   Advertising Campaigns:  Plan, execute, and analyze paid advertising campaigns on platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and Instagram Ads.   Analytics & Reporting:  Monitor, analyze, and report on the performance of marketing campaigns. Use data-driven insights to optimize and improve campaign effectiveness.   Collaboration:  Work closely with digital marketing agencies and internal teams to align marketing efforts with business goals.   Partnership Marketing:  Identify and develop partnerships with relevant industry stakeholders to enhance marketing reach and impact. Qualifications:   Education:  Bachelors degree in Marketing, Digital Marketing, Communications, or a related field.   Experience:  Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in digital marketing, preferably in the real estate industry.   Certifications:  Relevant certifications from reputed institutes (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Ads, HubSpot, Hootsuite). Skills:  Proficiency in graphic design tools (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva).  Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).  Strong understanding of SEO best practices and website management (e.g., WordPress,      HTML/CSS).  Experience with social media management tools (e.g., Hootsuite, Buffer).  Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions.  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.  Ability to multitask and manage multiple projects simultaneously.  Creativity and a keen eye for detail. What We Offer:  Competitive salary.   Opportunity to work with a dynamic and growing company.  Professional development and growth opportunities.  Collaborative and inclusive work environment. To apply send Email to  hr@indusvalleypl .com or WhatsApp resume at  9412783533

column2: We are seeking an experienced Admin/Facility Manager to oversee the operations and maintenance of our facilities     As a Facility Manager, you will be responsible for ensuring the efficient and safe operation of our buildings, equipment, and systems     You will oversee a team of maintenance staff and contractors, manage budgets, and ensure compliance with regulations and standards     The ideal candidate will have a strong background in facility management, excellent leadership skills, and a proactive approach to problem-solving           Responsibilities:     Facility Operations Management:         Develop and implement policies and procedures to ensure smooth facility operations.     Manage and coordinate maintenance activities, including preventive and corrective maintenance of building systems, equipment, and utilities.     Ensure compliance with health, safety, and environmental regulations and standards.     Oversee the operation of critical facility systems, such as HVAC, electrical, plumbing, and fire safety.     Monitor facility performance and implement improvement measures to optimize efficiency and reduce operational costs.     Conduct regular inspections to identify maintenance needs and address them promptly.       Budgeting and Resource Management:            Develop and manage the facility's annual budget, including operating expenses and capital projects.     Monitor expenditures, identify cost-saving opportunities, and ensure budget compliance.     Coordinate with vendors, suppliers, and contractors to obtain competitive pricing and quality services.     Manage inventory of equipment, tools, and supplies, ensuring adequate stock levels.         Vendor and Contract Management:            Source, negotiate, and manage contracts with vendors, suppliers, and service providers.     Establish and maintain strong relationships with contractors, ensuring adherence to service level agreements and quality standards.     Evaluate vendor performance and address any concerns or issues.       Emergency Preparedness and Risk Management:            Develop and implement emergency response plans, including fire safety, evacuation, and disaster recovery procedures.     Conduct regular drills and training sessions to enhance preparedness and response capabilities.     Identify and mitigate potential risks to the facility and occupants.       Qualifications:            Proven experience as a Facility Manager or in a similar role.       Strong knowledge of facility operations, maintenance practices, and regulatory requirements.     Familiarity with building systems, such as HVAC, electrical, plumbing, and fire safety.     Excellent leadership and team management skills.     Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities.     Effective communication and interpersonal skills.     Proficient in using facility management software and tools.     Ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple projects, and meet deadlines.     Knowledge of budgeting and financial management principles.     Knowledge of MS- Office and Tally.
